      рд╕реБрд╢рд╛рдВрдд рд╕рд┐рдВрд╣ рдХреА рдореГрддреНрдпреБ рдХреЗ рдмрд╛рдж рднреА рдпрд╣ рдЪрд░реНрдЪрд╛ рдЪрд▓реА рдереА рдХрд┐ рдЬрдм рд╡рд╣ рдЗрдВрдЬреАрдирд┐рдпрд░рд┐рдВрдЧ рдХрд╛ рдЯрд╛реЕрдкрд░ рдерд╛ , рддреЛ рдлрд┐рд░ рдЙрд╕рдиреЗ рдлрд┐рд▓реНрдо рдХрд╛ рдХреНрд╖реЗрддреНрд░ рдХреНрдпреЛрдВ рдЪреБрдирд╛ рдерд╛ ?

      рдЬрд┐рд╕ рджреЗрд╢ рдореЗрдВ рд╢реАрд░реНрд╖рд╕реНрде рд╡реИрдЬреНрдЮрд╛рдирд┐рдХреЛрдВ , рдбрд╛рдХреНрдЯрд░реЛрдВ , рдЗрдВрдЬреАрдирд┐рдпрд░реЛрдВ , рдкреНрд░рд╛рдзреНрдпрд╛рдкрдХреЛрдВ , рдЕрдзрд┐рдХрд╛рд░рд┐рдпреЛрдВ рдЗрддреНрдпрд╛рджрд┐ рдХреЛ рдкреНрд░рддрд┐рд╡рд░реНрд╖ 10 рд▓рд╛рдЦ рд╕реЗ 20 рд▓рд╛рдЦ рд░реБрдкрдпреЗ рдорд┐рд▓рддрд╛ рд╣реЛ , рдЬрд┐рд╕ рджреЗрд╢ рдХреЗ рд░рд╛рд╖реНрдЯреНрд░рдкрддрд┐ рдХреА рдХрдорд╛рдИ рдкреНрд░рддрд┐рд╡рд░реНрд╖ 1 рдХрд░реЛрдбрд╝ рд╕реЗ рдХрдо рд╣реА рд╣реЛ ; рдЙрд╕ рджреЗрд╢ рдореЗрдВ рдПрдХ рдлрд┐рд▓реНрдо рдЕрднрд┐рдиреЗрддрд╛ рдкреНрд░рддрд┐рд╡рд░реНрд╖ 10 рдХрд░реЛрдбрд╝ рд╕реЗ 100 рдХрд░реЛрдбрд╝ рд░реБрдкрдпреЗ рддрдХ рдХрдорд╛ рд▓реЗрддрд╛ рд╣реИ ред рдЖрдЦрд┐рд░ рдРрд╕рд╛ рдХреНрдпрд╛ рдХрд░рддрд╛ рд╣реИ рд╡рд╣  ? рдЖрдЦрд┐рд░ рд╡рд╣ рдРрд╕рд╛ рдХреНрдпрд╛ рдХрд░рддрд╛ рд╣реИ рдХрд┐ рдЙрд╕рдХреА рдХрдорд╛рдИ рдПрдХ рд╢реАрд░реНрд╖рд╕реНрде рд╡реИрдЬреНрдЮрд╛рдирд┐рдХ рд╕реЗ рд╕реИрдХрдбрд╝реЛрдВ рдЧреБрдирд╛ рдЕрдзрд┐рдХ рд╣реЛрддреА рд╣реИ ?

рдорди рддреЛ рдХрд╛рдирдкреБрд░ рдореЗрдВ рдмрд╕рдиреЗ рдХрд╛ рдмрдирд╛рдпрд╛ рдерд╛ рдХрд┐рдиреНрддреБ рдирд┐рдпрддрд┐ рд▓рдЦрдирдК рдЦреАрдВрдЪ рд▓рд╛рдпреАред

рдкреНрд░рд╛рдд:рдХрд╛рд▓ рдЬрд┐рд╕ рд╕рдордп рд╡рд╣ рдЕрдЦрд╝рдмрд╛рд░ рджреЗрдиреЗ рдЖрддрд╛ рдерд╛ рдЙрд╕ рд╕рдордп рдореИрдВ рдЙрд╕рдХреЛ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рдордХрд╛рди рдХреА 'рдЧреИрд▓рд░реА' рдореЗрдВ рдЯрд╣рд▓рддрд╛ рд╣реБрдЖ рдорд┐рд▓ рдЬрд╛рддрд╛ рдерд╛ред рдЕрдд: рд╡рд╣ рдореЗрд░реЗ рдЖрд╡рд╛рд╕ рдХреЗ рдореБрдЦреНрдп рджреНрд╡рд╛рд░ рдХреЗ рд╕рд╛рдордиреЗ рдЪрд▓рддреА рд╕рд╛рдЗрдХрд┐рд▓ рд╕реЗ рдирд┐рдХрд▓рддреЗ рд╣реБрдП рдореЗрд░реЗ рдЖрд╡рд╛рд╕ рдореЗрдВ рдЕрдЦрд╝рдмрд╛рд░ рдлреЗрдВрдХрддрд╛ рдФрд░ рдореБрдЭрдХреЛ *'рдирдорд╕реНрддреЗ рдмрд╛рдмреВ рдЬреА'* рд╡рд╛рдХреНрдп рд╕реЗ рдЕрднрд┐рд╡рд╛рджрди рдХрд░рддрд╛ рд╣реБрдЖ рдлрд░реНрд░рд╛рдЯреЗ рд╕реЗ рдЖрдЧреЗ рдмрдврд╝ рдЬрд╛рддрд╛ рдерд╛ред 

рдХреНрд░рдорд╢: рд╕рдордп рдмреАрддрдиреЗ рдХреЗ рд╕рд╛рде рдореЗрд░реЗ рд╕реЛрдХрд░ рдЙрдардиреЗ рдХрд╛ рд╕рдордп рдмрджрд▓ рдХрд░ рдкреНрд░рд╛рдд: 5:0 рдмрдЬреЗ рд╣реЛ рдЧрдпрд╛ред

рдЬрдм рдХрдИ рджрд┐рдиреЛрдВ рддрдХ рдореИрдВ рдЙрд╕рдХреЛ рдкреНрд░рд╛рдд: рдЯрд╣рд▓рддреЗ рдирд╣реАрдВ рджрд┐рдЦрд╛ рддреЛ рдПрдХ рд░рд╡рд┐рд╡рд╛рд░ рдХреЛ рдкреНрд░рд╛рдд: рд▓рдЧрднрдЧ 9:0 рдмрдЬреЗ рд╡рд╣ рдореЗрд░рд╛ рдХреБрд╢рд▓-рдХреНрд╖реЗрдо рд▓реЗрдиреЗ рдореЗрд░реЗ рдЖрд╡рд╛рд╕ рдкрд░ рдЖ рдЧрдпрд╛ред рдЬрдм рдЙрд╕рдХреЛ рдЬреНрдЮрд╛рдд рд╣реБрдЖ рдХрд┐ рдШрд░ рдореЗрдВ рд╕рдм рдХреБрд╢рд▓ рдордВрдЧрд▓ рд╣реИ рдореИрдВ рдмрд╕ рдпреВрдБ рд╣реА рджреЗрд░ рд╕реЗ рдЙрдардиреЗ рд▓рдЧрд╛ рдерд╛ рддреЛ рд╡рд╣ рдмрдбрд╝реЗ рд╕рд╡рд┐рдирдп рднрд╛рд╡ рд╕реЗ рд╣рд╛рде рдЬреЛрдбрд╝ рдХрд░ рдмреЛрд▓рд╛, *тАЬрдмрд╛рдмреВ рдЬреА! рдПрдХ рдмрд╛рдд рдХрд╣реВрдБ?"*

*тАЬрдмреЛрд▓реЛ"* рдореИрдВрдиреЗ рдХрд╣рд╛ред

*тАЬрдЖрдк рд╕реБрдмрд╣ рддрдбрд╝рдХреЗ рд╕реЛрдХрд░ рдЬрдЧрдиреЗ рдХреА рдЕрдкрдиреА рдЗрддрдиреА рдЕрдЪреНрдЫреА рдЖрджрдд рдХреЛ рдХреНрдпреЛрдВ рдмрджрд▓ рд░рд╣реЗ рд╣реИрдВ? рдЖрдк рдХреЗ рд▓рд┐рдП рд╣реА рдореИрдВ рд╕реБрдмрд╣ рддрдбрд╝рдХреЗ рд╡рд┐рдзрд╛рди рд╕рднрд╛ рдорд╛рд░реНрдЧ рд╕реЗ рдЕрдЦрд╝рдмрд╛рд░ рдЙрдард╛ рдХрд░ рдФрд░ рдлрд┐рд░ рдмрд╣реБрдд рддреЗрдЬрд╝реА рд╕реЗ рд╕рд╛рдЗрдХрд┐рд▓ рдЪрд▓рд╛ рдХрд░ рдЖрдк рддрдХ рдЕрдкрдирд╛ рдкрд╣рд▓рд╛ рдЕрдЦрд╝рдмрд╛рд░ рджреЗрдиреЗ рдЖрддрд╛ рд╣реВрдБ..... рд╕реЛрдЪрддрд╛ рд╣реВрдБ рдХрд┐ рдЖрдк рдкреНрд░рддреАрдХреНрд╖рд╛ рдХрд░ рд░рд╣реЗ рд╣реЛрдВрдЧреЗ .... рдФрд░ рдЖрдк!"*

*тАЬрд╡рд┐рдзрд╛рди рд╕рднрд╛ рдорд╛рд░реНрдЧ рд╕реЗ?"* рдореИрдВрдиреЗ рдкреНрд░рд╢реНрди рдХрд┐рдпрд╛ред

*тАЬрд╣рд╛рдБ! рд╕рдмрд╕реЗ рдкрд╣рд▓рд╛ рд╡рд┐рддрд░рдг рд╡рд╣реАрдВ рд╕реЗ рдкреНрд░рд╛рд░рдореНрдн рд╣реЛрддрд╛ рд╣реИ"* рдЙрд╕рдиреЗ рдЙрддреНрддрд░ рджрд┐рдпрд╛ред

*тАЬрддреЛ рдлрд┐рд░ рддреБрдо рдЬрдЧрддреЗ рдХрд┐рддрдиреЗ рдмрдЬреЗ рд╣реЛ?"*

*тАЬрдврд╛рдИ рдмрдЬреЗ.... рдлрд┐рд░ рд╕рд╛рдврд╝реЗ рддреАрди рддрдХ рд╡рд╣рд╛рдБ рдкрд╣реБрдБрдЪ рдЬрд╛рддрд╛ рд╣реВрдБред"*

*тАЬрдлрд┐рд░?"*, рдореИрдВрдиреЗ рдкреВрдЫрд╛ред

*тАЬрдлрд┐рд░ рд▓рдЧрднрдЧ рд╕рд╛рдд рдмрдЬреЗ рдЕрдЦрд╝рдмрд╛рд░ рдмрд╛рдБрдЯ рдХрд░ рдШрд░ рд╡рд╛рдкрд╕ рдЖрдХрд░ рд╕реЛ рдЬрд╛рддрд╛ рд╣реВрдБ..... рдлрд┐рд░ рджрд╕ рдмрдЬреЗ рдХрд╛рд░реНрдпрд╛рд▓рдп...... рдЕрдм рдмрдЪреНрдЪреЛрдВ рдХреЛ рдмрдбрд╝рд╛ рдХрд░рдиреЗ рдХреЗ рд▓рд┐рдП рдпреЗ рд╕рдм рддреЛ рдХрд░рдирд╛ рд╣реА рд╣реЛрддрд╛ рд╣реИредтАЭ*

рдореИрдВ рдХреБрдЫ рдкрд▓реЛрдВ рддрдХ рдЙрд╕рдХреА рдУрд░ рджреЗрдЦрддрд╛ рд░рд╣ рдЧрдпрд╛ рдФрд░ рдлрд┐рд░ рдмреЛрд▓рд╛, *тАЬрдареАрдХ! рддреБрдореНрд╣рд╛рд░реЗ рдмрд╣реБрдореВрд▓реНрдп рд╕реБрдЭрд╛рд╡ рдХреЛ рдзреНрдпрд╛рди рдореЗрдВ рд░рдЦреВрдБрдЧрд╛ред"*

рдШрдЯрдирд╛ рдХреЛ рд▓рдЧрднрдЧ рдкрдиреНрджреНрд░рд╣ рд╡рд░реНрд╖ рдмреАрдд рдЧрдпреЗред рдПрдХ рджрд┐рди рдкреНрд░рд╛рдд: рдиреМ рдмрдЬреЗ рдХреЗ рд▓рдЧрднрдЧ рд╡рд╣ рдореЗрд░реЗ рдЖрд╡рд╛рд╕ рдкрд░ рдЖрдХрд░ рдПрдХ рдирд┐рдордВрддреНрд░рдг-рдкрддреНрд░ рджреЗрддреЗ рд╣реБрдП рдмреЛрд▓рд╛, *тАЬрдмрд╛рдмреВ рдЬреА! рдмрд┐рдЯрд┐рдпрд╛ рдХрд╛ рд╡рд┐рд╡рд╛рд╣ рд╣реИ..... рдЖрдк рдХреЛ рд╕рдкрд░рд┐рд╡рд╛рд░ рдЖрдирд╛ рд╣реИредтАЬ*

рдирд┐рдордВрддреНрд░рдг-рдкрддреНрд░ рдХреЗ рдЖрд╡рд░рдг рдореЗрдВ рдЕрднрд┐рд▓реЗрдЦрд┐рдд рд╕рд╛рдордЧреНрд░реА рдХреЛ рдореИрдВрдиреЗ рд╕рд░рд╕рд░реА рдирд┐рдЧрд╛рд╣ рд╕реЗ рдЬреЛ рдкрдврд╝рд╛ рддреЛ рд╕рдВрдХреЗрдд рдорд┐рд▓рд╛ рдХрд┐ рдХрд┐рд╕реА рдбрд╛рдХреНрдЯрд░ рд▓рдбрд╝рдХреА рдХрд╛ рдХрд┐рд╕реА рдбрд╛рдХреНрдЯрд░ рд▓рдбрд╝рдХреЗ рд╕реЗ рдкрд░рд┐рдгрдп рдХрд╛ рдирд┐рдордВрддреНрд░рдг рдерд╛ред рддреЛ рдЬрд╛рдиреЗ рдХреИрд╕реЗ рдореЗрд░реЗ рдореБрдБрд╣ рд╕реЗ рдирд┐рдХрд▓ рдЧрдпрд╛, *тАЬрддреБрдореНрд╣рд╛рд░реА рд▓рдбрд╝рдХреА?"*

рдЙрд╕рдиреЗ рднреА рдЬрд╛рдиреЗ рдореЗрд░реЗ рдЗрд╕ рдкреНрд░рд╢реНрди рдХрд╛ рдХреНрдпрд╛ рдЕрд░реНрде рдирд┐рдХрд╛рд▓ рд▓рд┐рдпрд╛ рдХрд┐ рд╡рд┐рд╕реНрдордп рдХреЗ рд╕рд╛рде рдмреЛрд▓рд╛, *тАЬрдХреИрд╕реА рдмрд╛рдд рдХрд░ рд░рд╣реЗ рд╣реИрдВ рдмрд╛рдмреВ рдЬреА! рдореЗрд░реА рд╣реА рдмреЗрдЯреАред"*

рдореИрдВ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рдХреЛ рд╕рдореНрднрд╛рд▓рддреЗ рд╣реБрдП рдФрд░ рдХреБрдЫ рдЕрдкрдиреА рдЭреЗрдВрдк рдХреЛ рдорд┐рдЯрд╛рддреЗ рд╣реБрдП рдмреЛрд▓рд╛, *тАЬрдирд╣реАрдВ! рдореЗрд░рд╛ рддрд╛рддреНрдкрд░реНрдп рдХрд┐ рдЕрдкрдиреА рд▓рдбрд╝рдХреА рдХреЛ рддреБрдо рдбрд╛рдХреНрдЯрд░ рдмрдирд╛ рд╕рдХреЗ рдЗрд╕реА рдкреНрд░рд╕рдиреНрдирддрд╛ рдореЗрдВ рд╡реИрд╕рд╛ рдХрд╣рд╛редтАЬ*.

*тАЬрд╣рд╛рдБ рдмрд╛рдмреВ рдЬреА! рд▓рдбрд╝рдХреА рдиреЗ рдХреЗрдЬреАрдПрдорд╕реА рд╕реЗ рдПрдордмреАрдмреАрдПрд╕ рдХрд┐рдпрд╛ рд╣реИ рдФрд░ рдЙрд╕рдХрд╛ рд╣реЛрдиреЗ рд╡рд╛рд▓рд╛ рдкрддрд┐ рднреА рд╡рд╣реАрдВ рд╕реЗ рдПрдордбреА рд╣реИ ....... рдФрд░ рдмрд╛рдмреВ рдЬреА! рдореЗрд░рд╛ рд▓рдбрд╝рдХрд╛ рдЗрдВрдЬреАрдирд┐рдпрд░рд┐рдВрдЧ рдХреЗ рдЕрдиреНрддрд┐рдо рд╡рд░реНрд╖ рдХрд╛ рдЫрд╛рддреНрд░ рд╣реИредтАЭ*

рдореИрдВ рдХрд┐рдВрдХрд░реНрддрд╡реНрдпрд╡рд┐рдореВрдврд╝ рдЦрдбрд╝рд╛ рд╕реЛрдЪ рд░рд╣рд╛ рдерд╛ рдХрд┐ рдЙрд╕рд╕реЗ рдЕрдиреНрджрд░ рдЖрдХрд░ рдмреИрдардиреЗ рдХреЛ рдХрд╣реВрдБ рдХрд┐ рди рдХрд╣реВрдБ рдХрд┐ рд╡рд╣ рд╕реНрд╡рдпрдореН рдмреЛрд▓рд╛, *тАЬрдЕрдЪреНрдЫрд╛ рдмрд╛рдмреВ рдЬреА! рдЕрдм рдЪрд▓рддрд╛ рд╣реВрдБ..... рдЕрднреА рдФрд░ рдХрдИ рдХрд╛рд░реНрдб рдмрд╛рдБрдЯрдиреЗ рд╣реИрдВ...... рдЖрдк рд▓реЛрдЧ рдЖрдЗрдпреЗрдЧрд╛ рдЕрд╡рд╢реНрдпред"*

рдореИрдВрдиреЗ рднреА рдлрд┐рд░ рд╕реЛрдЪрд╛ рдЖрдЬ рдЕрдЪрд╛рдирдХ рдЕрдиреНрджрд░ рдмреИрдардиреЗ рдХреЛ рдХрд╣рдиреЗ рдХрд╛ рдЖрдЧреНрд░рд╣ рдорд╛рддреНрд░ рдПрдХ рдЫрд▓рд╛рд╡рд╛ рд╣реА рд╣реЛрдЧрд╛ред рдЕрдд: рдФрдкрдЪрд╛рд░рд┐рдХ рдирдорд╕реНрддреЗ рдХрд╣рдХрд░ рдореИрдВрдиреЗ рдЙрд╕реЗ рд╡рд┐рджрд╛рдИ рджреЗ рджреАред

рдЙрд╕ рдШрдЯрдирд╛ рдХреЗ рджреЛ рд╡рд░реНрд╖реЛрдВ рдХреЗ рдмрд╛рдж рдЬрдм рд╡рд╣ рдореЗрд░реЗ рдЖрд╡рд╛рд╕ рдкрд░ рдЖрдпрд╛ рддреЛ рдЬреНрдЮрд╛рдд рд╣реБрдЖ рдХрд┐ рдЙрд╕рдХрд╛ рдмреЗрдЯрд╛ рдЬрд░реНрдордиреА рдореЗрдВ рдХрд╣реАрдВ рдХрд╛рд░реНрдпрд░рдд рдерд╛ред рдЙрддреНрд╕реБрдХрддрд╛рд╡рд╢ рдореИрдВрдиреЗ рдЙрд╕рд╕реЗ рдкреНрд░рд╢реНрди рдХрд░ рд╣реА рдбрд╛рд▓рд╛ рдХрд┐ рдЖрдЦрд┐рд░ рдЙрд╕рдиреЗ рдЕрдкрдиреА рд╕реАрдорд┐рдд рдЖрдп рдореЗрдВ рд░рд╣рдХрд░ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рдмрдЪреНрдЪреЛрдВ рдХреЛ рд╡реИрд╕реА рдЙрдЪреНрдЪ рд╢рд┐рдХреНрд╖рд╛ рдХреИрд╕реЗ рджреЗ рдбрд╛рд▓реА?

*тАЬрдмрд╛рдмреВ рдЬреА! рдЗрд╕рдХреА рдмрдбрд╝реА рд▓рдореНрдмреА рдХрдерд╛ рд╣реИ рдлрд┐рд░ рднреА рдХреБрдЫ рдЖрдк рдХреЛ рдмрддрд╛рдпреЗ рджреЗрддрд╛ рд╣реВрдБред"*

*"рдЕрдЦрд╝рдмрд╛рд░, рдиреМрдХрд░реА рдХреЗ рдЕрддрд┐рд░рд┐рдХреНрдд рднреА рдореИрдВ рдЦрд╝рд╛рд▓реА рд╕рдордп рдореЗрдВ рдХреБрдЫ рди рдХреБрдЫ рдХрдорд╛ рд▓реЗрддрд╛ рдерд╛ред рд╕рд╛рде рд╣реА рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рджреИрдирд┐рдХ рд╡реНрдпрдп рдкрд░ рдЗрддрдирд╛ рдХрдбрд╝рд╛ рдЕрдВрдХреБрд╢ рдХрд┐ рднреЛрдЬрди рдореЗрдВ рд╕рдмреНрдЬреА рдХреЗ рдирд╛рдо рдкрд░ рд░рд╛рдд рдореЗрдВ рдмрд╛рдЬрд╝рд╛рд░ рдореЗрдВ рдмрдЪреА рдЦреБрдЪреА рдХрджреНрджреВ, рд▓реМрдХреА, рдмреИрдВрдЧрди рдЬреИрд╕реА рдореМрд╕рдореА рд╕рд╕реНрддреА-рдордВрджреА рд╕рдмреНрдЬреА рдХреЛ рд╣реА рдЦрд░реАрдж рдХрд░ рдШрд░ рдкрд░ рд▓рд╛рдХрд░ рдмрдирд╛рдпреА рдЬрд╛рддреА рдереАред"*

*"рдПрдХ рджрд┐рди рдореЗрд░рд╛ рд▓рдбрд╝рдХрд╛ рдкрд░реЛрд╕реА рдЧрдпреА рдерд╛рд▓реА рдХреА рд╕рд╛рдордЧреНрд░реА рджреЗрдЦрдХрд░ рд░реЛрдиреЗ рд▓рдЧрд╛ рдФрд░ рдЕрдкрдиреА рдорд╛рдБ рд╕реЗ рдмреЛрд▓рд╛, _'рдпреЗ рдХреНрдпрд╛ рд░реЛрдЬрд╝ рдмрд╕ рд╡рд╣реА рдХрджреНрджреВ, рдмреИрдВрдЧрди, рд▓реМрдХреА, рддрд░реЛрдИ рдЬреИрд╕реА рдиреАрд░рд╕ рд╕рдмреНрдЬрд╝реА...  рд░реВрдЦрд╝рд╛-рд╕реВрдЦрд╝рд╛ рдЦрд╝рд╛рдирд╛...... рдКрдм рдЧрдпрд╛ рд╣реВрдБ рдЗрд╕реЗ рдЦрд╛рддреЗ-рдЦрд╛рддреЗред рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рдорд┐рддреНрд░реЛрдВ рдХреЗ рдШрд░ рдЬрд╛рддрд╛ рд╣реВрдБ рддреЛ рд╡рд╣рд╛рдБ рдордЯрд░-рдкрдиреАрд░, рдХреЛрдлрд╝реНрддреЗ, рджрдо рдЖрд▓реВ рдЖрджрд┐....ред рдФрд░ рдпрд╣рд╛рдБ рдХрд┐ рдмрд╕ рдХреНрдпрд╛ рдХрд╣реВрдБ!!!!'_рдореИрдВ рд╕рдм рд╕реБрди рд░рд╣рд╛ рдерд╛ рддреЛ рд░рд╣рд╛ рди рдЧрдпрд╛ рдФрд░ рдореИрдВ рдмрдбрд╝реЗ рдЙрджрд╛рд╕ рдорди рд╕реЗ рдЙрд╕рдХреЗ рдкрд╛рд╕ рдЬрд╛рдХрд░ рдмрдбрд╝реЗ рдкреНрдпрд╛рд░ рд╕реЗ рдЙрд╕рдХреА рдУрд░ рджреЗрдЦрд╛ рдФрд░ рдлрд┐рд░ рдмреЛрд▓рд╛, _'рдкрд╣рд▓реЗ рдЖрдБрд╕реВ рдкреЛрдВрдЫ рдлрд┐рд░ рдореИрдВ рдЖрдЧреЗ рдХреБрдЫ рдХрд╣реВрдБред'_ рдореЗрд░реЗ рдРрд╕рд╛ рдХрд╣рдиреЗ рдкрд░ рдЙрд╕рдиреЗ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рдЖрдБрд╕реВ рд╕реНрд╡рдпрдореН рдкреЛрдЫ рд▓рд┐рдпреЗред"*

*"рдлрд┐рд░ рдореИрдВ рдмреЛрд▓рд╛, _'рдмреЗрдЯрд╛! рд╕рд┐рд░реНрдлрд╝ рдЕрдкрдиреА рдерд╛рд▓реА рджреЗрдЦред рджреВрд╕рд░реЗ рдХреА рджреЗрдЦреЗрдЧрд╛ рддреЛ рддреЗрд░реА рдЕрдкрдиреА рдерд╛рд▓реА рднреА рдЪрд▓реА рдЬрд╛рдпреЗрдЧреА ....... рдФрд░ рд╕рд┐рд░реНрдлрд╝ рдЕрдкрдиреА рд╣реА рдерд╛рд▓реА рджреЗрдЦреЗрдЧрд╛ рддреЛ рдХреНрдпрд╛ рдкрддрд╛ рдХрд┐ рддреЗрд░реА рдерд╛рд▓реА рдХрд┐рд╕ рд╕реНрддрд░ рддрдХ рдЕрдЪреНрдЫреА рд╣реЛрддреА рдЪрд▓реА рдЬрд╛рдпреЗред рдЗрд╕ рд░реВрдЦрд╝реА-рд╕реВрдЦрд╝реА рдерд╛рд▓реА рдореЗрдВ рдореИрдВ рддреЗрд░рд╛ рднрд╡рд┐рд╖реНрдп рджреЗрдЦ рд░рд╣рд╛ рд╣реВрдБред рдЗрд╕рдХрд╛ рдЕрдирд╛рджрд░ рдордд рдХрд░ред рдЗрд╕рдореЗрдВ рдЬреЛ рдХреБрдЫ рднреА рдкрд░реЛрд╕рд╛ рдЧрдпрд╛ рд╣реИ рдЙрд╕реЗ рдореБрд╕реНрдХрд░рд╛ рдХрд░ рдЦрд╛ рд▓реЗ ....ред'_*

*"рдЙрд╕рдиреЗ рдлрд┐рд░ рдореБрд╕реНрдХрд░рд╛рддреЗ рд╣реБрдП рдореЗрд░реА рдУрд░ рджреЗрдЦрд╛ рдФрд░ рдЬреЛ рдХреБрдЫ рднреА рдкрд░реЛрд╕рд╛ рдЧрдпрд╛ рдерд╛ рдЦрд╛ рд▓рд┐рдпрд╛ред рдЙрд╕рдХреЗ рдмрд╛рдж рд╕реЗ рдореЗрд░реЗ рдХрд┐рд╕реА рдмрдЪреНрдЪреЗ рдиреЗ рдореБрдЭрд╕реЗ рдХрд┐рд╕реА рднреА рдкреНрд░рдХрд╛рд░ рдХреА рдХреЛрдИ рднреА рдорд╛рдБрдЧ рдирд╣реАрдВ рд░рдХреНрдЦреАред рдмрд╛рдмреВ рдЬреА! рдЖрдЬ рдХрд╛ рджрд┐рди рдмрдЪреНрдЪреЛрдВ рдХреЗ рдЙрд╕реА рддреНрдпрд╛рдЧ рдХрд╛ рдкрд░рд┐рдгрд╛рдо рд╣реИред"*

рдЙрд╕рдХреА рдмрд╛рддреЛрдВ рдХреЛ рдореИрдВ рддрдиреНрдордпрддрд╛ рдХреЗ рд╕рд╛рде рдЪреБрдкрдЪрд╛рдк рд╕реБрдирддрд╛ рд░рд╣рд╛ред

рдЖрдЬ рдЬрдм рдореИрдВ рдпрд╣ рд╕рдВрд╕реНрдорд░рдг рд▓рд┐рдЦ рд░рд╣рд╛ рд╣реВрдБ рддреЛ рдпрд╣ рднреА рд╕реЛрдЪ рд░рд╣рд╛ рд╣реВрдБ рдХрд┐ рдЖрдЬ рдХреЗ рдмрдЪреНрдЪреЛрдВ рдХреА рдХреИрд╕реА рд╡рд┐рдХреГрдд рдорд╛рдирд╕рд┐рдХрддрд╛ рд╣реИ рдХрд┐ рд╡реЗ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рдЕрднрд┐рднрд╛рд╡рдХреЛрдВ рдХреА рд╣реИрд╕рд┐рдпрдд рдкрд░ рджреГрд╖реНрдЯрд┐ рдбрд╛рд▓реЗ рдмрд┐рдирд╛ рдЙрди рдкрд░ рдКрдЯрдкрдЯрд╛рдБрдЧ рдорд╛рдБрдЧреЛрдВ рдХрд╛ рджрдмрд╛рд╡ рдбрд╛рд▓рддреЗ рд░рд╣рддреЗ рд╣реИрдВред

10/11/20, 09:39 - Vijaya Mausi: рдЖрдЬрдХрд▓ рдПрдХ рдмреЬрд╛ *рдЦрддрд░рдирд╛рдХ*
*рдкреНрд░рдЪрд▓рди рдЪрд▓рд╛ рд╣реИ рд╣рд┐рдиреНрджреБрдУрдВ рдореЗрдВ,*

рд╡рд╣ рдпрд╣ рдХрд┐ рдЬреИрд╕реЗ рд╣реА рдХреЛрдИ рддреНрдпреМрд╣рд╛рд░ рдЖрдиреЗ рд╡рд╛рд▓рд╛ рд╣реЛрддрд╛ рд╣реИ,рдЦреБрдж рд╣рд┐рдиреНрджреВ рд╣реА рдЙрд╕ рддреНрдпреМрд╣рд╛рд░ рдХреЛ рдРрд╕реЗ рдкреЗрд╢ рдХрд░рддреЗ рд╣реИрдВ рдЬреИрд╕реЗ рд╡реЛ рдЙрдирдХреЗ рдКрдкрд░
рдмреЛрдЭ рд╣реИ :

1) рд░рдХреНрд╖рд╛рдмрдВрдзрди рдкрд░ рдореВрд░реНрдЦрддрд╛ :
рдХреБрдЫ рд╣рд┐рдиреНрджреВ рдРрд╕реЗ рдореИрд╕реЗрдЬ рднреЗрдЬрддреЗ рд╣реИрдВ рдХрд┐ ||рдХреЛрдИ рднреА рдЕрдирдЬрд╛рди рдЪреАрдЬ рдХреЛ рд╣рд╛рде рдирд╣реАрдВ рд▓рдЧрд╛рдпреЗ, рдЙрд╕рдореЗрдВ рд░рд╛рдЦреА рд╣реЛ рд╕рдХрддреА рд╣реИ !! 

2) *рджрд╢рд╣рд░рд╛ рдкрд░ рдореВрд░реНрдЦрддрд╛* :
 || рд░рд╛рд╡рдг рд╕реАрддрд╛ рдЬреА рдХреЛ рдЙрдард╛ рд▓реЗ рдЧрдпрд╛ рд╣реИ рдФрд░ рд░рд╛рдо рдЬреА рд▓рдВрдХрд╛ рдкрд░ рдЪреЭрд╛рдИ рдХрд░рдиреЗ рдЬрд╛ рд░рд╣реЗ рд╣реИрдВ, рдЙрд╕рдХреЗ рд▓рд┐рдпреЗ рдмрдВрджрд░реЛ рдХреА рдЖрд╡рд╢реНрдпрдХрддрд╛ рд╣реИ, 

 рд░рд╛рд╡рдг рдХреЛ рдХреЛрд░реНрдЯ рд▓реЗ рдЬрд╛рдпрд╛ рдЧрдпрд╛ рд╡ рдХрд╣рд╛ рдЧрдпрд╛ рдХрд┐ рдЧреАрддрд╛ рдкрд░ рд╣рд╛рде рд░рдЦ рдХрд╕рдо рдЦрд╛рдУ рддрдм рд░рд╛рд╡рдг рдХрд╣рддрд╛ рд╣реИ рд╕реАрддрд╛ рдкрд░ рд╣рд╛рде рд░рдЦрд╛ рдЙрд╕рдореЗрдВ рдЗрддрдирд╛ рдмрд╡рд╛рд▓ рд╣реЛ рдЧрдпрд╛, рдЧреАрддрд╛ рдкрд░ рд░рдЦрд╛ рддреЛ......||

рдпрд╣ рдмреЬреЗ рд╢рд░реНрдо рдХреА рдмрд╛рдд рд╣реИ

рдХрднреА рдЕрдкрдиреА рдорд╛рддрд╛ рдХреЗ рдмрд╛рд░реЗрдВ рдореЗрдВ рдРрд╕реЗ рдореЫрд╛реШ рдЙреЬрд╛рдпрд╛?

рд╣рдиреБрдорд╛рди рдЬреА рдХрд╛ рдордЬрд╛рдХ рдмрдирд╛рдпрд╛ рдЬрд╛рддрд╛ рд╣реИ рдХрд┐ рджреВрд╕рд░реЗ рдХреА рдмреАрдмреА рдХреЗ рд▓рд┐рдпреЗ рддреАрд╕рд░реЗ рдХреА рд▓рдВрдХрд╛ рдЬрд▓рд╛ рджреА ред

*рд╣рд┐рдиреНрджреВ рдзрд░реНрдо рдХреА рд╡рд┐рдбрдВрдмрдирд╛ рджреЗрдЦрд┐рдП :-*

рдЬрдиреНрдорд╛рд╖реНрдЯрдореА рдЖрдпреА рддреЛ рд╢реНрд░реА рдХреГрд╖реНрдг рдХреЛ рдЯрдкреЛрд░реА рддрдбреАрдкрд╛рд░ рдФрд░ рдирд╛ рдЬрд╛рдиреЗ 
рдХреНрдпрд╛-рдХреНрдпрд╛ рдХрд╣рд╛!

рдЧрдгреЗрд╢ рдЬреА рдЖрдпреЗ рддреЛ рдЙрдирдХрд╛ рднреА рдореЫрд╛реШ рдмрдирд╛рдпрд╛!

*рдирд╡рд░рд╛рддреНрд░рд┐ рдЖрдпреА рддреЛ рдпреЗ рдЪреБрдЯрдХреБрд▓рд╛ рдЖрдпрд╛ "рдиреМ рджрд┐рди рджреБрд░реНрдЧрд╛-рджреБрд░реНрдЧрд╛ рдлрд┐рд░ рдореБрд░реНрдЧрд╛-рдореБрд░реНрдЧрд╛..."*

*рд╡рд┐рдЬрдпрд╛рджрд╢рдореА рдкрд░ рд╢реНрд░реА рд░рд╛рдо-рдорд╛рддрд╛ рд╕реАрддрд╛ рдФрд░ рд░рд╛рд╡рдг рдкрд░ рдЪреБрдЯрдХреБрд▓реЗ рдЪрд▓реЗ!*

рдЕрдм рджрд┐рд╡рд╛рд▓реА рдкрд░ рднреА рдХреБрдЫ рдЖ рдЬрд╛рдпреЗрдЧрд╛!

*рдХрднреА рд╕реЛрдЪрд╛ рд╣реИ рдУрд░рд┐рдЬрдирд▓реА рдХреМрди рдпреЗ рд╕рдм рдкреЛрд╕реНрдЯ рдХрд░ рд░рд╣рд╛ рд╣реИ???*

*рдмрд╕ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рдореЛрдмрд╛рдЗрд▓ рдкрд░ рдЖрдпрд╛ рддреЛ рдмрд┐рдирд╛ рд╕реЛрдЪреЗ рд╕рдордЭреЗ рдлреЙрд░рд╡рд░реНрдб рдХрд░рдиреЗ рдХреА рд╡рд╣реА рднреЗрдбрд╝ рдЪрд╛рд▓ рдЪрд╛рд▓реВред

рдХрд┐рд╕реА рдФрд░ рдзрд░реНрдо рдХреЗ рд▓реЛрдЧреЛрдВ рдХреЛ рдЙрдирдХреЗ рдзрд░реНрдо рдХреЗ рдЬреЛрдХреНрд╕ рдкрдврд╝рддреЗ рдпрд╛ рдлреЙрд░рд╡рд░реНрдб рдХрд░рддреЗ рджреЗрдЦрд╛ рд╣реИ??

рдЙрдирдХреЛ рддреЛ рдЫреЛреЬреЛ, рдЖрдк рднреА рдЙрдирдХреЗ рдзрд░реНрдо рдХреЗ рдЬреЛрдХреНрд╕ рдлреЙрд░рд╡рд░реНрдб рдХрд░рдиреЗ рд╕реЗ рдкрд╣рд▓реЗ 10 рдмрд╛рд░ рд╕реЛрдЪрддреЗ рд╣реЛ рдХрд┐ рдХрд┐рд╕рдХреЛ рднреЗрдЬреВрдБ-рдХрд┐рд╕рдХреЛ рдирд╣реАрдВ??
*рддреЛ рд╣рд┐рдиреНрджреВ рдзрд░реНрдо рдХрд╛ рдореЫрд╛реШ рдЙреЬрд╛рддреЗ рд╢рд░реНрдо рдирд╣реАрдВ рдЖрддреА..??*
*рдореЗрд░рд╛ рдХрд░рдмрджреНрдз рдирд┐рд╡реЗрджрди рд╣реИ рдХрд┐ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рд╣рд╛рдереЛрдВ рд╕реЗ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рдзрд░реНрдо рдХрд╛ рдЕрдкрдорд╛рди рдирд╛ рдХрд░реЗрдВ..*ЁЯЩП

рдХреГрдкрдпрд╛ рдЗрд╕ рдкреЛрд╕реНрдЯ рдХреЛ рдЕрдзрд┐рдХ рд╕реЗ рдЕрдзрд┐рдХ рд╢реЗрдпрд░ рдХрд░реЗрдВ рдПрд╡рдВ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рд╕рднреА рдорд┐рддреНрд░реЛрдВ рдХреЛ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рд╣реА 
*рдзрд░реНрдо рдХрд╛ рдореЫрд╛рдХ рдирд╛ рдЙрдбрд╛рдиреЗ рдХреА рд╕рд▓рд╛рд╣ рджреЗ*

10/17/20, 19:47 - Mom: ЁЯШД *This one is ultimate*

*A foreigner came to Kashi.* 
*Visited  Viswanath's temple and all the ghats.* 

*Then he bought a VIBHUTHI packet from a boy selling on the street.* *Foreigner then asked, "what is its expiry date?"*

*Boy replied looking surprised: "Its made from expired people and when you apply on your forehead it increases your expiry date."*

10/18/20, 15:56 - Ranjana Mausi: As rcvd...
SAFETY SAFETY SAFETY.


Received following incidence. Please read carefully: 

Hi Friends,

Sharing this very important experience with you. Pls take 5 mins to read this.

Yesterday after my workout I went to take a shower. This is around 8am. I also wanted to clean the toilet before taking bath, so I put some blue harpic into the toilet and wash basin. I realised that the bottle got over and wasnтАЩt enough so I opened a fresh bottle of Harpic Bathroom Cleaner (Red bottle) and put it on top of the blue harpic. A few mins later I started scrubbing the toilet seats and I inhaled some of the strong fumes. I continued with the scrubbing and in 2 mins I started coughing. By the next min I was coughing profusely and I somehow managed to open the window. I kept coughing and my husband asked me if I needed some water. Even he didnтАЩt suspect it would be something bad. 

I continued coughing and my husband then angrily asked me to come out of the bathroom. I was not able to breathe both from my nose and mouth. And within few minutes I lost all sense of logic. I somehow opened the door and came out and went straight to the balcony to catch a breath. The coughing continued and I was sweating and panting for breath. I felt puckish and my head was paining badly. 

As we considered going to the hospital, I put some water for steam inhalation. That soothed me a bit. This coughing continued for almost 1 hour.

By 9:30 after multiple rounds of steaming I could sit in one place and take shallow breaths. By 12 noon I was able to speak normally, breathing was moderately controlled, and I could drink some hot tea. My mouth still had some chemical taste though. By 4 pm I was normal, though I had throat soreness due to coughing. I slept normally at night.

The reason for sharing this is because I didnтАЩt know that you should not mix harpic blue and harpic red!!! Yes it may seem that they both are similar products but they have different chemical composition. They both reacted together releasing gaseous fumes which inhaled and that was dangerous.

I donтАЩt have any history of asthma, shortness of breath, allergies, but just by inhaling these fumes I felt I was going to die. I shudder at the thought of what would happen to someone with a prior history.

*Some learning:*
1.) DonтАЩt mix the 2 chemicals EVER!
2.) Always keep the door and window open when using harpic or any bathroom cleaner
3.) I was able to somewhat recover within an hour, many may not. Make sure you consult a doctor immediately 

Pls spread the word amongst your family and friends so that no one else makes the mistake I made.

Regards,
Jayashree.              [Forwarded as received] Red harpic is bathroom cleaner which contains sodium hypochlorite  NaOCL.Blue harpic is a toilet cleaner which contains HCL.
When these two chemicals are mixed, it is released chlorine gas which is very toxic and life threatening. It  an damage respiratory track and will result in lung injury.

10/19/20, 17:05 - Vijaya Mausi: Please read this Article 
Please Introspect 

_*The Closeted Hindu*_

We Hindus are a very religious people. We are also very vocal about religion. We publicly support religious activities. We support and participate wholeheartedly in Eid and Iftar parties. We enjoy Christmas very lovingly. In fact, we celebrate Christmas without inhibitions. But we feel scared and awkward if we are asked about our own religion. Let alone talking, we are not even taught about the virtues of our religion in schools. Religious education, although a compulsory subject in schools in the progressive West, is shunned in our country, except the Christian Missionary-run schools and Madarsas which are allowed to teach religion. Shunned in a country which was at the pinnacle of success for centuries because of its Dharma. Why?

Our hitherto supposedly Hindu political dynasty and its Hindu cronies in politics and Media together have managed to inculcate into our mindsets that it is wrong, bordering on being criminal, to express our pro-Hindu religious affiliations. Why?...

A Christian can say тАШJesus ChristтАЩ and be not chastised for it, or a muslim can say тАШInshallahтАЩ  and be blessed for invoking тАШAllahтАЩ, but if we say тАШJai Shri RamтАЩ we become religious fanatics and are branded Saffron by our own fellow Hindus. Why?...

If a sea-going ship is launched in the West, it is acceptable to break a Champagne bottle against its hull to ward of evils. In fact, it has become the norm worldwide. But if a Hindu Defence Minister breaks a coconut to commemorate our latest fighter jets, then our own literati, our own Hindu intellectuals shame the Defence Minister for his religious belief, equating it to superstition. Why?...

A severely  lop-sided anti-Hinduism, as practised by some of our eminent Hindus, under the garb of Secularism which venerates Iftar parties, Christmas Dinners, but looks down upon Satyanarayan Pujas is the bane of the very foundation of the Hindu way of life. We have been very sublimely taught that It is OK for muslims to object the playing of aartis during Ganeshotsav and for the Govt to relent by castigating the organisers. But when a Hindu objects to the loudspeakers playing namaz everyday it becomes communal and anti-secular causing unpleasant uproar, not from the muslims but from our own liberated intellectuals! 
When a Sikh President does тАШsevaтАЩ at the Golden Temple, it is a matter of honour. When a President of muslim origin goes on тАШHajтАЩ pilgrimage, he is paying homage to traditions. But, when a Hindu PM goes for bhoomipoojan of Ram Temple, it is the death of secularism as is brandished by the elitist cadres of the so-called secular segment of Hinduism.

How did we land here? 
This situation has arisen because we Hindus are made to feel ashamed of our religion. We are made to feel our religion is inferior to the other тАШgreatтАЩ religions of the world. These thoughts have been drilled into our heads from our childhood and unfortunately, we have grown up accepting them as normal. On top of it our venerated, liberated intelligent and secular leadership did nothing to hold our religious identity high. To the contrary, it has always been trying to vilify our own Faith. 

This anti-Hindu sentiment is further helped and nurtured by our deceptive and Left-leaning education system that the Hindus have been indoctrinated into. We have been very craftily pushed into accepting this baptism of destructive pseudo-secularism by deceit, creating a rift amongst ourselves. The Macaulay-putras have very successfully managed to topple the pinnacle of Hindu rashtra by making our own people turn against the very founding principles of Hinduism.

Hinduism has become the butt of jokes amongst the so-called educated, liberated elite Scotch-sipping Hindus. Educated they might be, but they certainly lack the civility that goes with nobility that is Hinduism. Not just them, even our own Hindu stand-up comedians make fun of our religion, because we are tolerant. They will never make fun of the other Faiths because they know the consequences of such acts. It is very easy to burn a copy of Manu Smruti or any of our Hindu scriptures and not feel the heat, but no one dares to say a word about the Quran, let alone burn it.

I use the word Hinduism because today it has become synonymous with our faith. It is not the word of my choice. It is too myopic in its ability to describe and define our Faith (Ssnstana Dharma). Unfortunately this nomenclature too was forced upon us by the outsiders. And we accepted it. We have no qualms in accepting the wrongdoings against our very own tenets. 
Why?... 
Because for generations the outsiders, the rulers, or to be precise, the raiders from outside, and later on, those Hindus who took up the mantle from these outsiders, knew that it was in their favour to keep the populace of this Bharatvarsha ignorant about the reality. 
This induced ignorance has helped the rulers reap the riches of keeping discord in the Society. This was possible at the expense of the Hindus in inadvertently giving up our religious identity, as it was deemed to be poisonous to acknowledge its very existence and more so be a follower of the faith.

Those who managed to adhere to Hinduism were branded Hindu fanatics by none other than our own Hindu brothers. The westernised products of our Hindu Society who adapted to the Single Malt and caviar culture started shunning the virtues of Hindu philosophy and caved into the invasion of the Abrahamic religions on to this pious soil of ours. They not only gave in, but also became their foot-soldiers and ambassadors. Using their accented and polished english, these agents of anti-Hinduism have time and again done their best to show our own culture and religion down.

Yes, we are tolerant, but that doesnтАЩt give anybody a licence to demean our own culture. Yes, we are non-violent, but it is not a sign of cowardice but a great virtue which we guard with calour. Yes, we are all accommodating and acknowledge the greatness of other faiths, but that doesnтАЩt mean we donтАЩt value our Faith. 

This is a message of awakening to all Hindus who are opposing the idea of Hinduism.

If a Hindu doesnтАЩt subscribe to a particular idea, no problem, people have multiple options within Hinduism to follow, or for that matter even follow another religion. No issues with that. But, donтАЩt downgrade or vilify our own religion. It is this duplicity amongst our own people that has hollowed our cultural tree and our Faith from inside.

The aggressors, the war-mongering blood-thirsty raiders as well as the Missionaries under the guise of preaching their faith, have systemically broken our religious spine to keep us Hindus just for namesake, but anti-Hindu in practice by turning our own Hindu brothers again Hinduism. 

This well-planned anti-Hindu strategy has turned us into 'closeted Hindus' and our own people are stopping us from coming out of this closet.

Do ponder and introspect on this issue. ЁЯЩПЁЯЩПЁЯЩПЁЯЩПЁЯЩП

10/26/20, 14:20 - Mom: ЁЯСитАНЁЯПл

A Professor started his class on a very serious Topic. The moment he turned towards the blackboard, one of the students whistled. He turned, looked at the class and asked the Whistler's name. No one answered.

The Professor peacefully kept the Pen in his pocket saying: "Lecture ends here. I'll tell you a story to utilise the remaining time".

Everyone became interested.

"Yesterday night I tried hard to sleep, but it was miles away from my eyes, so I thought I'd better get petrol in my car, which will save my time next morning and might induce sleep. After having my tank full, I started roaming in that area, enjoying the peace of a traffic free ride.

Suddenly, on the corner I saw a girl who was as young and beautiful as the clothes she was wearing. Must have been returning from a party. Out of courtesy, I turned my car towards her and asked if I may be of any help. She asked me if I could drop her to her home, she'll be very obliged, to which I agreed.

She sat in the front seat with me. We started talking, and to my amazement she was very intelligent, had control on many topics which many youngsters don't.

When we reached her address, she admitted my courteous nature and behavior and accepted that she had fallen in love with me.

I also admitted her intelligence and beauty and that I've also started liking her. I told her about my job as a professor in the university.

The girl asked my number, which I gave her willingly. Then she asked me a favor, to which i couldn't have denied naturally.

She said that her brother is a student in the same university, and asked me to take care of him, since we'll be in a long relationship now.

I asked the name of the student. She said that I'll recognise him with one of his very prominent quality, *He whistles a lot!*

All eyes in the classroom turned towards the boy who had whistled.

The professor said: *"I didn't buy my Ph.D in Psychology.. I earned it"*

10/28/20, 09:37 - Vijaya Mausi: Please circulate this message posted by Arnab Goswami
----------------------------
 I am sharing with a sense of disbelief that Parambir has intensified the attack on my journalists. He has started a series of summons. journalists from our Delhi, Noida and Mumbai operations have been summoned. They are all being given under 24 hours notice. Even when some are recovering from COVID, the Mumbai police says they have to travel and be before their police stations. Apparently he has asked his cops to go "all out". During the interrogations, we are being told to tone down or else Param will file more fake cases against us. In all we have endured 150 hours of semi custodial interrogation. They say they want to 'break us'. As is now public knowledge one of the interrogators is a Shiv Sena leaders who has pending cases for charges like extortion. All Republic employees and journalists are resolutely fighting this. For us, this is a battle we are certain to win. We are exercising legal remedies. The courts will hear the people. I am shocked that the Udhav government has endorsed the use of the 1922 British law against my network. I say once again, the time has come for a mass movement against this injustice. I am a self made media entrepreneur. I will fight my battle from Mumbai. The people of Mumbai and the people of India are with me. By way of this message, I am calling upon the people of India to fight this madness that the rogue cop and his insecure political masters have unleashed. Please share this message. In whichever way you can. We have to win this.

Arnab

10/29/20, 18:08 - Vijaya Mausi: *DID ANYONE NOTICE THE EIGHT BIG STEPS TAKEN IN 10 DAYS BY THE MINISTRY OF HOME AFFAIRS IN J&K ?*

1. 5 Lakh Hindu-Sikh Families Became Jammu & Kashmir Domiciles.

2. All Perks / Facilities Withdrawn From Omar Abdullah & Mehbooba.

3. Kashmir Lost Control Over All Universities Including Jammu & Kashmir National Law University.

4. Kashmir Lost Control Over Hindu Shrines.

5. Competent Authority Empowered To Take Suo Moto Notice And Evict Encroachers From Properties Hindus Left Behind In Kashmir In 1990.

6. Kashmir Lost Control Over All Golf And Other Clubs In J&K.

7. Role Of Kashmir (CM) In University Affairs Reduced To Zero.

8. Legal Protection Granted To Anti-Nationals In J&K 42 Years Ago revoked
Now, Those Facing Public Safety Act, 1978, Can Be Put In Any Jail Outside J&K.

9. No Secretariat Move for Now From Jammu To Kashmir Or Secretariat Will Continue To Function In Jammu.

Some more additions :
1.  All facilities withdrawn from all ex CMтАЩs including Farooq, Omar, Azad, Mehbooba including accommodation and vehicles. 
2.  All Universities now directly controlled by New Delhi and curriculum in these universities to be modified away from being Kashmir centric. 
3.  Hindu shrines were always controlled by the Dharmath Trust or respective Shrine Boards. Now these boards report directly to Home Ministry. But that is not all. Now even J&K Waqf Board (Auqaf) has been taken over by New Delhi and all its assets, which till now were created by contributors and niyaz from Kashmiri Muslims, have been taken over by New Delhi and will be controlled by them. 
4.  New Delhi has empowered local administration to evict locals from properties they might have purchased from Pandits. Sale deeds could be nullified. 
5.  Not only golf courses but all forest lands and tourist development authorities are now directly controlled by New Delhi. They can issue, allot, lease or provide prime land and facilities to anybody from India now. 
6.  J&K CM has been reduced to number 15 on the Warrant of Precedence from earlier 7. 
All nominations of J&K CM from Universory boards or Waqf boards has been removed. 
7.   All Kashmiri IAS officers have been posted in less important positions, while non local officials are running the  administration from Jammu. 
8.   Land banks of thousands of kanals have been indefinite and earmarked in different districts of Kashmir to be allotted to non state subjects in the name of тАШinvestment and industryтАЩ.

*We were Just Wondering WHY Home Minister is So Much Quiet in Corona Fight, Delhi and Mumbai incidents. He Silently Enforced These Actions In J&K. Last steps of India for Jammu and Kashmir.*

11/6/20, 04:55 - Vijaya Mausi: рдЬрдп рд╢реНрд░реА рд░рд╛рдо
11/6/20, 05:09 - Vijaya Mausi: Many years ago - there was a gentlemen called Arindam Chaudhari. He wore a pony tail, ranted a lot of nonsense, valued businesses worth Rs. 10 Lakhs for Rs. 100 Crore and mocked at India for being old fashioned.

He started an Institute - promising this and that and this and that. He charged exorbitant fees and in return gave a Laptop and some highly dubious course material and promised you - you would be in Wall Street in 3 years time.

Today - 22000 Students at least have filed over 1700 Petitions, Complaints against him in wild fury and anger - all over India especially in Bangalore. I am one of the 219 Lawyers who have filed petitions in both Karnataka (Through Associate Counsel) and Madras High Courts. He has been accused of a variety of charges from fraud to tax evasion.

Every generation has its own Arindam Chaudhari.

They target the Average and Below Average students - and promise them the sun and the moon. These poor kids - get baited hook line and sinker. Aware of their shortcomings and realizing that they will never get into IIMs or get a perfect GRE Score or an attractive engineering college - they are convinced that their life will change.

In my opinion:-

Byjus is the Arindam Chaudhari 2.0

The Same Arindam Chaudhari brand of baiting the Average and Below Average by promising them the sun, the moon and the stars.

First off are the exorbitant charges. Like Chaudhari - they too give you a Laptop and charge you almost Rs. 1.5 Lakhs for Classes I - Class III. Thats 50,000/- for a year but like a Vegetable Market if you choose the three year package - you get it for Rs. 90,000/-.

Likewise as you go to a higher class- you pay a higher sum. For taking their package upto Class X - you pay Rs. 2 Lakhs flat. (From 4th to 10th).

And you have different combinations for 11th and 12th - beginning from Rs. 70,000/- to Rs. 1,80,000/- plus horrendous fees for English and Hindi alone (Around 80,000/-)

Plus Rs. 5000/- for a Test Series

Plus Rs. 45,000/- for Crash Courses.

So the charges are huge. Almost equivalent to school fees and in many cases higher than what schools charge - at least in Tamilnadu.

Now are there any serious benefits?

Unless Byju's has a direct line to the Goddess Kaali and can give divine blessings to the students - the answer is NO

Average Students will continue to be Average. Below Average students will continue to be below Average.

Most of the IIT Toppers are Toppers for two reasons - One reason of course if that they work hard but the other reason is THEY ARE INTELLIGENT.

You cannot bring an Average guy and make him an IIT Topper just by offering a glitzy course with glossy pamphlets.

I speak with examples of course.

A Neighbor of mine - enrolled her kid who scored 63% marks in Class X to the 11th and 12th plan of Byjus. Apparently the woman assured her that the Kid was intelligent and should go to the Science group and that their system would take care of any chinks. She spoke so well that this woman literally handed over her child to Byju's like you did in the old days - handing your child to a guru in a gurukul.

The Kids marks did not improve. He worked hard but to no avail. Supposedly there was a counsellor but he was a half baked fellow himself - who kept telling the kid to mutter this shloka and that.

The Woman shelled out Rs. 1.90 Lakhs to Byju's (Her SBI Credit or Debit Card was used every time) and each time she came to pay the money - there would be promises -

тАШHe just has to overcome his tensionтАЩ ; тАШHe just has to concentrateтАЩ;тАЩHe is a very bright student butтАжтАЩ

Meanwhile the Kids Maths Teacher literally told the mother тАЬYour son is very average. He simply cannot study in the Science Group. Please place him somewhere - where he can relax and do wellтАЭ

Eventually the Kid secured 68% in Class XII with 59 marks in Mathematics. The Mother was distraught and requested my wife to ask me to come with her to Byju's. Apparently Byju's had promised the mother that if the Kid did not get less than 75% , they would give him 12th coaching again free of cost or would refund some money or a lot of money (Not sure how much).

So we went and immediately the woman got some other schmuck wearing a shirt and tie who gave a card to us - and began his slick lies. He brought up some report card and said the kid was this and that (Which the mother had never heard of before that day) and reluctantly refused to repeat the 12th Coaching again or give a refund.

The mother was in tears - and I realized there was nothing in writing. Just as we left - the Schmuck - came to us and told us тАЬSir! I can help you out. I can get the Kid a second chance at 40% discount and i can give you a one on one coachingтАЭ

Slowly more and more mothers - more and more of the same story.

    They target the Average and Below Average Students
    They charge exorbitant fees
    Their teachers are selected from Schools and they get huge cuts and commissions for referrals. So a Teacher intentionally gives lower and lower marks to the student and тАЬadvisesтАЭ the mother to send the child to a Tuition like Byju's
    They promise the sun, the moon and the stars
    Eventually unless you leak the paper - the Average Student and Below Average Student will continue to remain average and below average or if they do we'll, it would be their own hard work not Byju's
    When you go back angry - they will make excuses and send you home

Then i heard they are now valued at 88000 Crores !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I am Ashamed.

Why am i Ashamed?

Because our Country is a target for these so called тАЬEducational InstitutionsтАЭ - to come and offer the world to the mediocre and suck their money and leave them dry and reeling.

In China - the Average is told he is average and is given an Average Job. He is happy.

In Singapore - the Average also gets an Average Job and is happy

In USA and India - the Average is promised that he is extraordinary and offered a course for huge fees promising the sun, the moon and the stars and after everything is finished - he gets ZILCH except a big loss of money or worse - a Loan from a private lender.

It is one of the Biggest Cons in the History of Indian Education

You want to do well :-

    Assess your Intelligence
    Find out your Range
    Do the best that you can for your Range
    However work as hard as possible to achieve the best in your range

Remember the homily of Senathypathy in Indian тАЬIf you can get a job with your own talent and education - good - otherwise settle down and do any honorable job you can do your best atтАЭ

P.S:- The NEET and IIT courses of Byju's are not included. I don't have enough data to conclude if they are dubious or not.

So Byju's is not a slap on Indias Education System but a Slap on India and every Average Indian out there.

11/7/20, 18:21 - Vijaya Mausi: 1) The total population of Kerala is 35699443.

2) Muslim population in Kerala is 8873472(26%).

3) Number of Madrassas in Kerala 21683

4) Number of Madrassa teachers in Kerala  204683

5) Total no of panchayats in state 941

6) Average  number ofmadrassas per panchayat  21684/941=23(More than one per ward even)

7) Salary for these madrassa teachersRs 25000/- per month( besides Rs300/-per hour allowance )

8 ) So expense to the state 204683x25000=5117075000

9)  Pension expenses for the madrassa teachers per month( Introduced by Pinarai govt to appease them)@6000x200000=1200000000.
So total expenses  5117075000+1200000000=6317075000x12=75804900000(seven thousand five hundred and eighty Crores and forty nine lakhs)
Calculator may not have that much digit space !!!

11/10/20, 10:47 - Vijaya Mausi: *(Excellent forward on the true meaning of religion in the Army nd it's ethos)*


*OF BUDDIES & RELIGION*

┬аWhen I was a first termer in NDA (not the political one; this is the far more prestigious National Defence Academy), I overheard two Drill Ustaad speaking to each other about the new Colonel Training of the academy. "Madrassi hai, pata nahi kya kya changes ho jayega training mei", one of them mumbled in a forlorn tone. Being a South Indian myself, I wondered why this particular emphasis on the OfficersтАЩ regional base was to be discussed. 
I soon forgot about it, caught up with the hectic routine of the academy. 

One day, while being seated in the academy, I saw a smartly turned out Sikh Colonel striding on to the stage to address the cadets. I shot a quick question to my neighbour, "Who's he?" 
I got a response in return, "Colonel Training". 
"No way, the Colonel Training is a Madrassi, not a Sikh officer," I said in all my dead sure and smug tone. "Yes, you fool. He is a Madrassi - he belongs to the Madras Regiment". 

My smugness made a quick exit and I learned a lesson that day. An officer's religion is that of his men. Period.
That day, and the 18 years that have followed, I saw not one reason to believe otherwise.

Religious beliefs in the Army have fierce rooting. Men kill and die on the war cries of Gods and Goddesses. It is what keeps them bonded, glued and motivated. It is what makes them believe that they are being looked after.
 In this overall scheme of things, a leader's role is nothing less than the link between the deity and the man on the ground. 
A 'Bihari' may well be a Coorgi from Karnataka and a 'JAT' may be a Mallu from Kerala. It is the Regiment that matters, not the origins. Terms like 'Pahadi', 'Pandit', 'Tambi' are terms that are used with pride and dignity, not otherwise.

As a young Gun Position Officer, when for the first time, we were poised for live firing in the Rajasthan Ranges, I stood with all others for the Aarti that is performed before the Guns would start firing. In all the ensuing chants of 'Om Jai Jagadish Hare,' I remained mum, not once uttering a single line of the hymn. After the Aarti ended and the Pandit offered the┬аPrasaad, I again refused to partake of it.

Later, when the men dispersed to get ready for the firing, our Second in Command (2ic) got hold of me and questioned me as to why I did not participate in the Aarti wholeheartedly. I told him that I was a non-believer and did not intend taking part in the religious act. He looked at me long and hard, and with all his restraint, he told me that it doesn't matter one bit whether I believed or not, it is a parade and I will bloody well sing the bhajan and consume the Prasaad. I mumbled a defiant acceptance but only later realised that it matters whether one participates or not. The man who believes, cannot be discouraged by a leader who doesn't. It is a Parade and it is supposed to be done with all sincerity. 
The 2ic, by the way, was a Christian.

As a Captain with 3 years of service, I was posted in Drass and for a long time, I was the convoy commander between Drass and Sonamarg. Those who have negotiated the Zozi La would recollect the prominent┬а┬аCaptain's Mor┬а(turn) where Captain HC Vadera of the MADRAS Sappers gave up his life during a road widening work in 1954. 

The Captain's Memorial is a permanent pit stop for every vehicle that crosses the Pass. It is considered an ill omen if one passes the point without paying obeisance. It didn't matter if I believed or not. As the Convoy Commander, I had to believe; there was no choice. 
There are similar cases of Harbhajan Baba and many more in every nook and corner of the country. 
These are the things that matter to the simple military man/woman. One cannot ignore these in the larger interest.

For a large part of my unit life, my buddy was a guy called Mohammad Jabir, fondly called as Javed at home.┬аHe was fiercely religious and followed all religious procedures diligently. He was a young recruit and had certain inhibitions in being a 'buddy'. I did not ask him to do anything that he wasn't comfortable doing. In a short time, we developed a unique bond which was based on mutual respect. He used to do tasks for me out of his interest without any external prodding. Not only that, but he was also a good professional soldier who knew his tasks on the Gun well and took a keen interest in Unit activities in addition to being a fantastic Boxer and sportsman.

Every day with Javed was learning. He was a storehouse of knowledge. My Father coined the term тАШHanumanтАЩ for him. He was like that. No task was impossible and nothing was less than 100%. He was part of the family. Need I mention that not once did it occur to us that as per the social norms, we were at two extreme ends of the spectrum? A South Indian Brahmin family and a North Indian Muslim.

There simply is no place for religious biases or prejudices in the Indian Army.

There was an occasion when we were posted in Delhi and were allotted a spanking new flat as accommodation. I was tired of staying in the guestroom and was keen on shifting into the house immediately. My wife was then out of the station and not likely to get back any time sooner. Initially, Javed tried to delay the shifting by giving reasons that the house was being handed over slowly. Thereafter he started giving flimsy reasons amounting to much more delay. When I finally confronted him on what was happening, he gave me a sheepish answer that we were waiting for the auspicious day to shift into the new house! 
My wife and Javed were in constant discussion on this so-called auspicious time. Eventually, it did happen and he completed the ritual by boiling milk in a new pot until it boiled over the sides to symbolize an abundance of prosperity and food to bless the new home as per the Hindu rituals. Only then was I allowed to set foot into the house!

Javed was with me through thick and thin. He was there when I picked up my little one in my arms; he was there when we had a marriage in the family and he was also there when we picked up the mortal remains of my Father and lit the funeral pyre when I was down and out.
Religion cannot superimpose itself on humanity or the soldierly bonhomie.

Most common sights that one would encounter in a Fauji religious ceremonies would be that of a Sikh/Muslim/Christian┬а┬аCommanding officer or Subedar major performing the regimental Hawan and Aarti on religious occasion; people of all faith come together in devotion under a common roof called Sarv Dharm Sthal; singing their hearts out in┬аAarti┬аor┬аArdaas. 
These are not some special sights. These are some of the most common ones which do not even need a second glance or be mentioned especially since the fabric of the Indian Army is so interwoven with acceptance of all religions and beliefs. There is simply no room for bias or favouritism.
It is very important to follow religious practices and beliefs in the army. Simply because a Soldier needs to repose his faith in a Superior Being.

It is that belief in the Almighty that assures him that no harm will come his or his┬аPaltan's┬аway. It is that hope which consoles him that even if something were to happen to him, his family will be taken care of. And it is the same belief that gives him confidence of victory in the battle field, however impossible the odds are.
It is essential that the hope and belief remain unadulterated and regular gatherings in the Sarv Dharm Sthal be organised to keep the flame of their faith burning.

_A notable dialogue of the Protagonist from the Hindi Movie 'PK' goes thus - "Till the time I believed in the existence of God, I had hope of finding my Remote. The day I concluded that there is no God, I lost my hope"._
Succinct and precise.┬а

*An officer has a massive responsibility. As was evident in my earlier examples, dealing with a multitude of faiths and beliefs, it is a sensitive and delicate balance that has to be ensured. Years of peaceful coexistence preclude any undesirable situation from erupting but as an officer, this balance must be maintained at all costs. The boat should not be rocked, least of all by an officer himself. I have realized that what works best for every individual is to keep their strong beliefs to themselves and not give them air. Each individual has the freedom to practice their religion but being part of an organization like the Armed forces, individual choices mustn't clutter the environment. At no cost should personal preferences come in the way of discharging official responsibilities.*
 If the men under us are different colours and flavours, we are the Blender.

 And on that note, Heave Ho!

11/11/20, 19:42 - Vijaya Mausi: *DawoodтАЩs тАШSupariтАЩ USD 50 million to target Republic TV legally, economically and mentally*.....*Savio Rodrigues*

https://goachronicle.com/dawoods-supari-usd-50-million-to-target-republic-tv-legally-economically-and-mentally/amp/?__twitter_impression=true

The global terrorist Dawood Ibrahim has taken out a USD 50 million supari to target Republic TV legally, economically, and mentally.

At first, I did not believe it, when a senior intelligence officer of a central intelligence agency told me this. But when I started to put the pieces of the jigsaw together. It started to make complete sense.

One week ago, I has broken this story, about a source of тАЬGoaChronicle.com working in an international intelligence arm that focuses on South Asia terrorism and counter-terrorism informed that a number: 0092306####310 has been in touch with key people in India and their focus discussion has been to work on plans to restrain Arnab Goswami and Republic TV Network.

The source also mentioned that this person could be in touch with someone in Mumbai police or in touch with someone influential in the media fraternity but could not affirmatively confirm who is the person receiving the calls from Pakistan.

GoaChronicle further decided to investigate the Pakistani number: 0092306####310.

The number belongs to an officer of the Special Services Group (SSG) of the Pakistan Army. The name by which the officer of SSG goes by is тАУ Ishaq.

The SSG is an elite Commando unit of the Pakistan Army. It is also known as the Maroon Berets. The officers in SSG are directly recruited by PakistanтАЩs ISI.
SSGтАЩs core focus areas of operations are foreign internal defense, reconnaissance, counter-terrorism action, direct action, and unconventional warfare. But it also operates in the dark arts of espionage тАУ information operations and psychological operations.

In fact, is if you go back into history into SSG operations against India, in January 2013, India accused Pakistan that Army Special Service Group led an attack across the Line of Control (LoC) in which Indian soldiers were killed and beheaded.

If SSG is in touch with someone in the Mumbai police or media, then it is a matter of grave national security. It is an issue that goes beyond just targetting Arnab Goswami and Republic TV, it is about threatening the sovereignty of the nation.тАЭ

It was based on this story that the senior intelligence officer spoke to me through a common associate, informing me that the troubling issue of the people targeting Arnab Goswami and Republic TV is the focus on Dawood, Drugs, and Bollywood post the death of Sushant Singh Rajput. In the past, the focus of drugs or Dawood has been spoken about but never discussed so persistently and vehemently.

He told me that currently in Mumbai, there is reportedly USD 50 million put out to target Republic TV and Arnab Goswami. The focus is to target him legally, economically, and mentally. No known decision has been taken to physically harm Arnab Goswami but the focus on legal, economical, and mental is certain. The idea is to get him to stop focusing on the Sushant Singh Rajput case. The more Republic focuses on it, the more it will focus on Bollywood, Drugs, and Dawood. It will also bring out in the open the connection of Dawood, Bollywood, and politics in Mumbai and India.

He further added that the USD 50 million is not a ball-park figure, it can go to even as high as USD 100 million, it means that they will spend a considerable amount to divert the focus from Dawood, Drugs, and Bollywood, eventually from the Sushant Singh Rajput case.

The intelligence officer further informed that Kangana Ranaut too would be targeted in a similar manner тАУ legally, financially, and mentally.

When asked about other media channels and why only target Arnab Goswami. He told me that eventually in most media channels the issue around the Sushant Singh Rajput case will find closure and eventually no focus will be on Dawood, Bollywood, or Drugs in the weeks ahead.

The reason for this vicious attack on the Republic TV network and Kangana Ranaut, according to the intelligence officer is business. The persistent focus on Bollywood, Drugs, and Dawood is expected to hamper business. It is also putting certain political leaders in a questionable position with direct or indirect links to Bollywood, Drugs, and Dawood.

 All this is coming out, post the death of Sushant Singh Rajput.
The intelligence officer also advised me to be careful and alert because of my appearance on Republic TV and my open naming of Dawood Ibrahim, Drugs and Bollywood post the Sushant Singh Rajput death case on two news channels, one of which is Republic TV.

He further explained the importance of drug money to the overall activities of the D-company and Dawood relationship with a global terror organisation.

It is no secret that Dawood is currently under the protection of the Pakistan government and ISI. Dawood is a global terrorist and a drug kingpin operating out of Pakistan.

On June 1, 2006, US President George Bush designated three foreign individuals and two foreign entities in the seventh annual set of determinations of drug traffickers who will be subject to the sanctions provided in the Foreign Narcotics Kingpin Designation Act (тАЬKingpin ActтАЭ). This action brings the total number of individuals and entities designated under the Kingpin Act to 62 since the first designations were made in 2000.

The US PresidentтАЩs action was voiced determination to do everything possible to pursue drug traffickers, undermine their operations, and end the suffering that trade in illicit drugs inflicts on Americans and other people around the world, as well as preventing drug traffickers from supporting terrorists.

The Kingpin Act, which became law in December 1999, targets significant foreign narcotics traffickers, their organizations, and operatives worldwide, denying them access to the U.S. financial system and all trade and transactions involving U.S. companies and individuals.

The Kingpin Act does not target the countries in which these foreign individuals and entities are operating or the governments of such countries.

The foreign individuals and entities the President has designated this year as appropriate for sanctions under the Kingpin Act are Dawood Ibrahim (India), Fahd Jamil Georges (Brazil), and Ali Naway (Iran). In fact, in the list of entities, the Dawood Ibrahim Organization that operated in India, Pakistan, and UAE, were also designated under the Kingpin Act along with Amezcua Contreras Organization (Mexico).

The U.S. Treasury Department today announced that it is designating Dawood Ibrahim as a Specially Designated Global Terrorist under Executive Order 13224 and will be requesting that the United Nations list him as well.  The designation froze any assets belonging to Ibrahim within the U.S. and prohibited transactions with U.S. nationals:
тАЬDawood Ibrahim (тАЬIBRAHIMтАЭ), the son of a police constable, has reigned as one of the pre-eminent criminals in the Indian underworld for most of the past two decades.

IBRAHIMтАЩs syndicate is involved in large-scale shipments of narcotics in the U.K. and Western Europe. The syndicateтАЩs smuggling routes from South Asia, the Middle East, and Africa are shared with Usama bin Laden and his terrorist network. Successful routes established over recent years by IBRAHIMтАЩs syndicate have been subsequently utilized by bin Laden. A financial arrangement was reportedly brokered to facilitate the latterтАЩs usage of these routes. In the late 1990s, IBRAHIM traveled in Afghanistan under the protection of the Taliban.

IBRAHIMтАЩs syndicate has consistently aimed to destabilize the Indian government through inciting riots, acts of terrorism, and civil disobedience. He is currently wanted by India for the March 12, 1993, Bombay Exchange bombings, which killed hundreds of Indians and injured over a thousand more.

Information, from as recent as Fall 2002, indicates that IBRAHIM has financially supported Islamic militant groups working against India, such as Lashkar-e- Tayyiba (LeT). For example, this information indicates that IBRAHIM has been helping finance increasing attacks in Gujarat by LeT. Lashkar-e-Tayyiba (Army of the Righteous) is the armed wing of Markaz-ud-Dawa-wal-Irsha (MDI) тАУ a Sunni anti-US missionary organization formed in 1989. The United States added LeT to the list of designated terrorists in October 2001. The group was banned by the Pakistani government, and its assets frozen, in January 2002.
Dawood Ibrahim Fact Sheet

The United Nations Security Council under QDi.135 Dawood Ibrahim Kaskar was listed as a Global Terrorist

Dawood Ibrahim Kaskar was listed on 3 November 2003 pursuant to paragraphs 1 and 2 of resolution 1390 (2002) as being associated with Al-Qaida, Usama bin Laden or the Taliban for тАЬparticipating in the financing, planning, facilitating, preparing or perpetrating of acts or activities by, in conjunction with, under the name of, on behalf or in support ofтАЭ, тАЬsupplying, selling or transferring arms and related materiel toтАЭ or тАЬotherwise supporting acts or activities ofтАЭ Usama bin Laden, Al-Qaida (QDe.004) and the Taliban.

Dawood Ibrahim Kaskar has used his position as one of the most prominent criminals of the Indian underworld for most of the past two decades to support Al-Qaida (QDe.004) and related groups. In particular, his criminal syndicate has been involved in large-scale shipments of narcotics and has shared its smuggling routes from South Asia, the Middle East, and Africa with Usama bin Laden (deceased) and his terrorist network. A financial arrangement was brokered to facilitate their usage of these routes. In the late 1990s, Kaskar traveled to Afghanistan under the protection of the Taliban.

Information from 2002 indicates that Kaskar had financially supported Al-Qaida-related groups such as Lashkar-e-Tayyiba (LeT) (QDe.118). For example, this information indicates that he had been helping finance attacks in Gujarat, India, by LeT.

Kaskar is also wanted in India in connection with the 12 March 1993 Bombay Exchange bombings, which killed over 250 people and injured over one thousand more.

Kaskar, his criminal band known as тАЬDтАЭ company and other associates continue to engage in criminal activity in India and Nepal. This includes conspiracy to kill political leaders and counterfeiting currencies.
DAWOOD IBRAHIM KASKAR | United Nations Security Council
The reportage of Republic TV and Arnab Goswami has rattled the Dawood Ibrahim company and the political patron in India. There is a single point agenda, get Arnab Goswami and Republic TV to stop at any cost or loss тАУ financially, economically, and mentally.

ЁЯОЙЁЯОКЁЯкФ
*резреи рдирд╡рдВрдмрд░ : рдзрди рддреЗрд░рд╕*
рд╢реНрд░реА рдХреБрдмреЗрд░ рдЬреА рдЖрдкрдХрд╛

ЁЯТЕЁЯд╣тАНтЩВя╕ПЁЯкФ
*резрей рдирд╡рдВрдмрд░ : рд░реВрдк рдЪреМрджрд╕*
рд╕реБрдЦ, рд╕рдВрдкрдиреНрдирддрд╛, рдкреНрд░рд╕рдиреНрдирддрд╛

ЁЯПоЁЯМЯЁЯкФ
*резрек рдирд╡рдВрдмрд░ : рджреАрдкрд╛рд╡рд▓реА*

ЁЯРДЁЯОЛЁЯкФ
*резрел рдирд╡рдВрдмрд░ : рдЧреЛрд╡рд░реНрдзрдирдкреВрдЬрд╛*

11/17/20, 07:36 - Mom: <Media omitted>
11/17/20, 09:34 - Vijaya Mausi: On 10 Mar 1826 Thomas Munro, the Governor of Madras Presidency, submitted a detailed Census and a Survey Report to the British government. The report was a тАШbreaking newsтАЩ not only to the British government in India but also in England where it surprised the top brass. What was in that report that revealed certain unknown facts about India to the world?
 
The geographical dimensions of Madras Presidency was from Ganjam district of Orissa to entire South India. The population was 1,28,50,941. There were 12,498 primary schools. This is in spite of the fact that the collector of Mangalore did not send a report due to some reasons, and many hilly areas were not covered.
 
As per the report, on an average there was one primary school for one thousand population. Whereas England had a dismal average of primary education record. In fact, Britain didnтАЩt have an education policy then. Another interesting fact even Indians were not aware of was тАУ only 24% of students in these schools comprised of Brahmins, Kshatriyas and Vaishyas. Shudras constituted a LionтАЩs share of 65%! The statistics are according to data presented in The Beautiful Tree.
 
So, that shattered the general impression that existed that the Brahmins dominated the education field. Of course in the higher education institutions, they were in majority. Why then, the Britishers who came to India to loot and pillage, conducted such a nationwide survey covering Bengal, Bihar, Punjab, Bombay and Madras Presidencies?
 
By beginning of 19th century, Britishers established themselves in most parts of India. They now wanted a steady, assured revenue to fill the British coffers. But they were few in numbers to collect revenue from every nook and corner of such a huge milching cow of a nation like India. Also employing British personnel was becoming an expensive proposition. They wanted to find out how to bring in an education system to make certain locals тАШliterateтАЩ so they can be employed at cheaper rates to maintain accounts and help in administration. Such English speaking people will remain loyal to them and it would be easier to keep them divided as тАЬEnglish speaking classтАЭ and тАЬothersтАЭ.
 
This survey made the British wonder how come in spite of outsiders plundering India repeatedly destroying their assets, culture and sentiments, such an education system continued to exist? Traditionally every village temple was sponsoring a Pathashala, Gurukul or Mutt. On an average 35% of the land in a village belonged to the temple. This was a revenue free land. The temple rituals, festivals, fee for the teachers were paid out of this income from the land.
 
Sending a boy on the тАЬfifth day of the fifth month of fifth yearтАЭ was widely believed to be an auspicious day in those days. Some temples even provided тАЬAnna PrasadтАЭ to the students. Every family used to send a boy for at least three years till he learns to read, write and do basic calculation. Subsequently he would learn the trade of his family tradition. Girls were normally taught at homes.
 
Apart from this, the village temples served as nuclei of important social, economic, artistic and intellectual functions. They were the library for not only scriptures, Vedas and Upanishads but also local literature inscribed on palm leaves. These libraries were called тАШSaraswati BhandharaтАЩ. There was a Jyothishi, a Vaidya, and a delivery nurse who were part of the temple and their renumeration was paid by the temple either in cash or by farm produce. Temples also provided free shelter and food to travellers and pilgrims.
 
In the Madras Presidency, temples managed regional development function, such as irrigation projects, building and maintaining water tanks, canals, land reclamation, post-disaster relief and recovery. These activities were paid for by the donations of the villagers and pilgrims. Thus temples were the epicenter of primary education, skill development and vocational training. First thing that the Britishers did was to hide this report.
 
In England, factory workers left their children in a room before entering the workplace. These rooms were called тАЬSchoolsтАЭ. In fact the terminology тАШschoolтАЩ originated here. Children were given some rudimentary education by a worker who wasnтАЩt fit for factory work. There were тАЬGrammar SchoolsтАЭ for the children from well to do families who had to pay a very hefty fee.
 
This was the education system that existed there. How could they digest the fact that India had a robust primary education system in place without any government grants or endowments. Next thing they did was to reduce the revenue free land of temples to 5% so that the temples barely sustained themselves. Gradually temples stopped sponsoring Gurukuls and Pathshalas.
 
Then came Thomas Macaulay! He is the Destroyer of Sanatana BharatтАЩs Education System. The primary education system was dying due to lack of support and sponsorship. Britishers introduced English education system in high schools. The fee was high and only few well to do families could afford it. The literacy rate of India nosedived to never heard of limits.
 
In 1931, Gandhi raised this issue in the Round table conference. He accused British government of destroying the education system. British denied GandhijiтАЩs allegations. They wanted the proof. Even Gandhiji was aware of the 1826 survey that was either hidden or destroyed. It was discovered much later that it was hidden in the archive room of British Library.
 
The Beautiful Tree is a book written by Shri Dharampal on this Survey. He took up a job in British Library just to unearth this report. When he finally found the hidden report, he sat down to write this book.
Essentially, Britishers found the education system of India to be a тАШBeautiful TreeтАЩ. So they found out the roots of this tree and uprooted it! Such intolerance!

Do the MacaulayтАЩs children in India who are now thriving in sold media, Lutyens circuits, looking through red glasses, ever bothered to learn what was the level of primary education system that existed in Santana Bharat?
 
As per the latest reports, India has approximately 638,000 villages, some 5000 towns and around 400 cities. LetтАЩs say for every village there is one temple at least, so, that makes it around six Lakh temples in the villages alone. Just imagine if six lakh temples and their communities were left to govern themselves like the way they were functioning in Pre British era. Each village would be able to function effectively, based on the local issues and needs.
 
IsnтАЩt it time to empower our temples once again? Sakshara rakshasas who grew up in MacaulayтАЩs educational methods would allow this? Will the political institutions who are just happy squandering away a huge pile of temple money, let go off such a Kamadhenu, Kalpavriksha?
11/17/20, 09:39 - Vijaya Mausi: *ЁЯМ╣рдЖрдк рднреА рдЬрд╛рдирд┐рдПЁЯМ╣*

*рдХреНрдпреЛрдВ рдХрд╛рдпрд╕реНрде 24 рдШрдВрдЯреЗ рдХреЗ рд▓рд┐рдП рдирд╣реАрдВ рдХрд░рддреЗ рдХрд▓рдо рдХрд╛ рдЙрдкрдпреЛрдЧ*
       рдЬрдм рднрдЧрд╡рд╛рди рд░рд╛рдо рдХреЗ рд░рд╛рдЬрддрд┐рд▓рдХ рдореЗрдВ рдирд┐рдордВрддреНрд░рдг рдЫреБрдЯ рдЬрд╛рдиреЗ рд╕реЗ рдирд╛рд░рд╛рдЬ рднрдЧрд╡рд╛рдиреН рдЪрд┐рддреНрд░рдЧреБрдкреНрдд рдиреЗ рд░рдЦ рджреА рдереА рдХрд▓рдо !! рдЙрд╕ рд╕рдордп рдкрд░реЗрд╡рд╛ рдХрд╛рд▓ рд╢реБрд░реВ рд╣реЛ рдЪреБрдХрд╛ рдерд╛ ред

  рдкреБрд░реА рджреБрдирд┐рдпрд╛ рдореЗрдВ рдХрд╛рдпрд╕реНрде рд╕рдорд╛рдЬ рдХреЗ рд▓реЛрдЧ рджреАрдкрд╛рд╡рд▓реА рдХреЗ рджрд┐рди рдкреВрдЬрди рдХреЗ рдмрд╛рдж рдХрд▓рдо рд░рдЦ рджреЗрддреЗ рд╣реИ рдФрд░ рдлрд┐рд░ рдпрдорджреБрддрд┐рдпрд╛ рдХреЗ рджрд┐рди рдХрд▓рдо-рджрд╡рд╛рдд рдХреЗ рдкреВрдЬрди рдХреЗ рдмрд╛рдж рд╣реА рдЙрд╕реЗ рдЙрдард╛рддреЗ рд╣реИ I

рдРрд╕реЗ рдореЗрдВ рдЬрдм рд░рд╛рдЬреНрдпрддрд┐рд▓рдХ рдореЗрдВ рд╕рднреА рджреЗрд╡реА-рджреЗрд╡рддрд╛ рдЖ рдЧрдП рддрдм рднрдЧрд╡рд╛рдиреН рд░рд╛рдо рдиреЗ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рдЕрдиреБрдЬ рднрд░рдд рд╕реЗ рдкреВрдЫрд╛ :- рднрдЧрд╡рд╛рди рдЪрд┐рддреНрд░рдЧреБрдкреНрдд рдирд╣реАрдВ рджрд┐рдЦрд╛рдИ рджреЗ рд░рд╣реЗ рд╣реИ ? рдЗрд╕ рдкрд░ рдЬрдм рдЦреЛрдЬ рдмреАрди рд╣реБрдИ рддреЛ рдкрддрд╛ рдЪрд▓рд╛ рдХреА рдЧреБрд░реБ рд╡рд╢рд┐рд╖реНрда рдХреЗ рд╢рд┐рд╖реНрдпреЛрдВ рдиреЗ рднрдЧрд╡рд╛рди рдЪрд┐рддреНрд░рдЧреБрдкреНрдд рдХреЛ рдирд┐рдорддреНрд░рдг рдкрд╣реБрдВрдЪрд╛рдпрд╛ рд╣реА рдирд╣реАрдВ рдерд╛ ред рдЬрд┐рд╕рдХреЗ рдЪрд▓рддреЗ рднрдЧрд╡рд╛рдиреН рдЪрд┐рддреНрд░рдЧреБрдкреНрдд рдирд╣реАрдВ рдЖрдпреЗ I рдЗрдзрд░ рднрдЧрд╡рд╛рдиреН рдЪрд┐рддреНрд░рдЧреБрдкреНрдд рд╕рдм рдЬрд╛рди рдЪреБрдХреЗ рдереЗ рдФрд░ рдЗрд╕реЗ рдкреНрд░рднреБ рд░рд╛рдо рдХреА рдорд╣рд┐рдорд╛ рд╕рдордЭ рд░рд╣реЗ рдереЗ ред рдлрд▓рд╕реНрд╡рд░реВрдк рдЙрдиреНрд╣реЛрдВрдиреЗ рдЧреБрд░реБ рд╡рд╢рд┐рд╖реНрда рдХреА рдЗрд╕ рднреВрд▓ рдХреЛ рдЕрдХреНрд╖рдореНрдп рдорд╛рдирддреЗ рд╣реБрдП рдпрдорд▓реЛрдХ рдореЗрдВ рд╕рднреА рдкреНрд░рд╛рдгрд┐рдпреЛрдВ рдХрд╛ рд▓реЗрдЦрд╛-рдЬреЛрдЦрд╛ рд▓рд┐рдЦрдиреЗ рд╡рд╛рд▓реА рдХрд▓рдо рдХреЛ рдЙрдард╛ рдХрд░ рдХрд┐рдирд╛рд░реЗ рд░рдЦ рджрд┐рдпрд╛ I

рд╕рднреА рджреЗрд╡реА рджреЗрд╡рддрд╛ рдЬреИрд╕реЗ рд╣реА рд░рд╛рдЬрддрд┐рд▓рдХ рд╕реЗ рд▓реМрдЯреЗ рддреЛ рдкрд╛рдпрд╛ рдХреА рд╕реНрд╡рд░реНрдЧ рдФрд░ рдирд░рдХ рдХреЗ рд╕рд╛рд░реЗ рдХрд╛рдо рд░реБрдХ рдЧрдпреЗ рдереЗ ред рдкреНрд░рд╛рдгрд┐рдпреЛрдВ рдХрд╛ рдХрд╛ рд▓реЗрдЦрд╛ рдЬреЛрдЦрд╛ рдирд╛ рд▓рд┐рдЦреЗ рдЬрд╛рдиреЗ рдХреЗ рдЪрд▓рддреЗ рдпреЗ рддрдп рдХрд░ рдкрд╛рдирд╛ рдореБрд╢реНрдХрд┐рд▓ рд╣реЛ рд░рд╣рд╛ рдерд╛ рдХреА рдХрд┐рд╕рдХреЛ рдХрд╣рд╛рдБ рднреЗрдЬреЗ I 
*#рддрдм рдЧреБрд░реБ рд╡рд╢рд┐рд╖реНрда рдХреА рдЗрд╕ рдЧрд▓рддреА рдХреЛ рд╕рдордЭрддреЗ рд╣реБрдП рднрдЧрд╡рд╛рди рд░рд╛рдо рдиреЗ рдЕрдпреЛрдзреНрдпрд╛ рдореЗрдВ рднрдЧрд╡рд╛рдиреН рд╡рд┐рд╖реНрдгреБ рджреНрд╡рд╛рд░рд╛ рд╕реНрдерд╛рдкрд┐рдд рднрдЧрд╡рд╛рди рдЪрд┐рддреНрд░рдЧреБрдкреНрдд рдХреЗ рдордВрджрд┐рд░ ***
( рд╢реНрд░реА рдЕрдпреЛрдзреНрдпрд╛ рдорд╣рд╛рддреНрдордп рдореЗрдВ рднреА рдЗрд╕реЗ рд╢реНрд░реА рдзрд░реНрдо рд╣рд░рд┐ рдордВрджрд┐рд░ рдХрд╣рд╛ рдЧрдпрд╛ рд╣реИ рдзрд╛рд░реНрдорд┐рдХ рдорд╛рдиреНрдпрддрд╛ рд╣реИ рдХрд┐ рдЕрдпреЛрдзреНрдпрд╛ рдЖрдиреЗ рд╡рд╛рд▓реЗ рд╕рднреА рддреАрд░реНрдердпрд╛рддреНрд░рд┐рдпреЛрдВ рдХреЛ рдЕрдирд┐рд╡рд╛рд░реНрдпрдд: рд╢реНрд░реА рдзрд░реНрдо-рд╣рд░рд┐ рдЬреА рдХреЗ рджрд░реНрд╢рди рдХрд░рдирд╛ рдЪрд╛рд╣рд┐рдпреЗ, рдЕрдиреНрдпрдерд╛ рдЙрд╕реЗ рдЗрд╕ рддреАрд░реНрде рдпрд╛рддреНрд░рд╛ рдХрд╛ рдкреБрдгреНрдпрдлрд▓ рдкреНрд░рд╛рдкреНрдд рдирд╣реАрдВ рд╣реЛрддрд╛ред) 
*** *рдореЗрдВ рдЧреБрд░реБ рд╡рд╢рд┐рд╖реНрда рдХреЗ рд╕рд╛рде рдЬрд╛рдХрд░ рднрдЧрд╡рд╛рди рдЪрд┐рддреНрд░рдЧреБрдкреНрдд рдХреА рд╕реНрддреБрддрд┐ рдХреА рдФрд░ рдЧреБрд░реБ рд╡рд╢рд┐рд╖реНрда рдХреА рдЧрд▓рддреА рдХреЗ рд▓рд┐рдП рдХреНрд╖рдорд╛рдпрд╛рдЪрдирд╛ рдХреА, рдЬрд┐рд╕рдХреЗ рдмрд╛рдж  рднрдЧрд╡рд╛рди рд░рд╛рдо рдХреЗ рдЖрдЧреНрд░рд╣ рдорд╛рдирдХрд░ рднрдЧрд╡рд╛рди рдЪрд┐рддреНрд░рдЧреБрдкреНрдд рдиреЗ рд▓рдЧрднрдЧ рек рдкрд╣рд░ (реирек рдШрдВрдЯреЗ рдмрд╛рдж ) рдкреБрди: *рдХрд▓рдо рджрд╡рд╛рдд рдХреА рдкреВрдЬрд╛ рдХрд░рдиреЗ рдХреЗ рдкрд╢реНрдЪрд╛рдд рдЙрд╕рдХреЛ рдЙрдард╛рдпрд╛ рдФрд░ рдкреНрд░рд╛рдгрд┐рдпреЛрдВ рдХрд╛ рд▓реЗрдЦрд╛ рдЬреЛрдЦрд╛ рд▓рд┐рдЦрдиреЗ рдХрд╛ рдХрд╛рд░реНрдп рдЖрд░рдореНрдн рдХрд┐рдпрд╛ I рдХрд╣рддреЗ рддрднреА рд╕реЗ рдХрд╛рдпрд╕реНрде рджреАрдкрд╛рд╡рд▓реА рдХреА рдкреВрдЬрд╛ рдХреЗ рдкрд╢реНрдЪрд╛рдд рдХрд▓рдо рдХреЛ рд░рдЦ рджреЗрддреЗ рд╣реИрдВ рдФрд░ *#рдпрдорджреБрддрд┐рдпрд╛ рдХреЗ рджрд┐рди рднрдЧрд╡рд╛рди рдЪрд┐рддреНрд░рдЧреБрдкреНрдд рдХрд╛ рд╡рд┐рдзрд┐рд╡рдд рдХрд▓рдо рджрд╡рд╛рдд рдкреВрдЬрди рдХрд░рдХреЗ рд╣реА рдХрд▓рдо рдХреЛ рдзрд╛рд░рдг рдХрд░рддреЗ рд╣реИ*

рдХрд╣рддреЗ рд╣реИ рддрднреА рд╕реЗ рдХрд╛рдпрд╕реНрде рдмреНрд░рд╛рд╣реНрдордгреЛрдВ рдХреЗ рд▓рд┐рдП рднреА рдкреВрдЬрдиреАрдп рд╣реБрдП рдФрд░ рдЗрд╕ рдШрдЯрдирд╛ рдХреЗ рдкрд╢реНрдЪрд╛рдд рдорд┐рд▓реЗ рд╡рд░рджрд╛рди рдХреЗ рдлрд▓рд╕реНрд╡рд░реВрдк рд╕рдмрд╕реЗ рджрд╛рди рд▓реЗрдиреЗ рд╡рд╛рд▓реЗ рдмреНрд░рд╛рд╣реНрдордгреЛрдВ рд╕реЗ рджрд╛рди рд▓реЗрдиреЗ рдХрд╛ рд╣реШ рд╕рд┐рд░реНрдл рдХрд╛рдпрд╕реНрдереЛрдВ рдХреЛ рд╣реА рд╣реИ I

*рдХреГрдкрдпрд╛ рдпреЗ рдЬрд╛рдирдХрд╛рд░реА рдЕрдиреНрдп рдХрд╛рдпрд╕реНрде рдмрдиреНрдзреБ рдХреЛ рдЖрдЧреНрд░рд╕рд╛рд░рд┐рдд рдХрд┐рдЬрд┐рдРрдВ..*

рдХреЗрд╡рд▓ 3 рдХрд░реНрдорд┐рдпреЛрдВ рд╕реЗ рд╢реБрд░реВ рдХреА рдЧрдИ рд╕рдВрд╕реНрдерд╛ рдореЗрдВ рдЖрдЬ 150 рд╕реЗ рдЕрдзрд┐рдХ рдХрд░реНрдордЪрд╛рд░реА рд╣реИрдВ рдЬрд┐рд╕рдореЗ 100 рд╕реЗ рдЕрдзрд┐рдХ рдорд╣рд┐рд▓рд╛рдПрдВ рд╣реИрдВред рдЗрд╕реА рдмреАрдЪ рдЕрдВрдХрд┐рдд рдФрд░ рдЙрдирдХреА рдЯреАрдо рдиреЗ рдлреВрд▓реЛрдВ рдХреЛ рд░рд┐рд╕рд╛рдЗрдХрд┐рд▓ рдХрд░ рдХреЗ рд╡рд┐рд╢реНрд╡ рдХрд╛ рдкрд╣рд▓рд╛ рдСрд░реНрдЧреЗрдирд┐рдХ рдерд░реНрдорд╛рдХреЛрд▓ рдмрдирд╛ рджрд┐рдпрд╛ рд╣реИ рдЬрд┐рд╕рдХрд╛ рдирд╛рдо "рдлреНрд▓реЛрд░реЛрдлреЛрдо" рд░рдЦрд╛ рдЧрдпрд╛ рд╣реИред

ЁЯСЗЁЯП╝

1) рджреВрдз *рдЧрд╛рдп* рдХрд╛ рд▓реЗрдирд╛ рд╣реИрдВ рдпрд╛ *рднреИрдВрд╕* рдХрд╛ ?

2) рд░реЛрдЯреА *рд╣рд╛рде рд╕реЗ* рддреЛреЬрдХрд░ рдШреЛрд▓рдиреА рд╣реИрдВ рдпрд╛ *Grinder* рд╕реЗ ?

3) рдПрдХ *рд░реЛрдЯреА* рдХреЗ рд▓рд┐рдП рдХрд┐рддрдирд╛ *рджреВрдз* рд▓реЗрдирд╛ рд╣реИрдВ ?

4) рджреВрдз рдореЗрдВ *рд╢рдХреНрдХрд░* рдХреА рдЬрдЧрд╣ *рдЧреБрдбрд╝* рдбрд╛рд▓ рд╕рдХрддреЗ рд╣реИрдВ ?

5) рдПрдХ рд░реЛрдЯреА рдХреЗ рд▓рд┐рдП *рд╢рдХреНрдХрд░* рдХрд┐рддрдиреА рдЪрдореНрдордЪ рдбрд╛рд▓рдиреА рд╣реИрдВ ?

6) рджреВрдз *рдардВрдбрд╛* рд▓реЗрдирд╛ рд╣реИрдВ рдпрд╛ *рдЧрд░реНрдо* ?

*Subject : Declaring Kerala as Union Territory* 

*Respected Sir,* 

*Kerala State Population in 2020, is Estimated to the tune of 36 Million (3.6 Crores) according to Unified Identification Aadhar India .. It is the 23rd Largest State in India, by Area of 38863 Sq. Kms. ..!!* 

*Hindu Population had come down Nosedively Less than 50%; in the Last Three Decades. The Rate of Richest Religion in Kerala is Highest among Muslims at 25%; followed by Christans at 20%; and Hindus at 8%; which is very much Alarming to Hindus in the State ..!!* 

*The Fastest-Growing Religion is Muslim, at 25%: followed by Christans at 20%; and Hindus at 3%; as of now .. In the near future, Kerala State will be Dominated by Muslims. At present they are demanding to declare as Muslim State, which will follow 'Shariyat Law' in the State .. Most of the Muslim Population have Migrated ILLEGALLY , from Bangala Desh and Myanmar (Rohingya Muslims ..!!)* 

*Most of the Urban Naxalites and Terrorists are from Kerala, supported by Popular Front of India (PFI ) Funded by Muslim Countries ..!!* 

*Many times, Hindu Temples/Ashrams are not only threatened, but also robbed by Muslims and Donations given by Hindu Devotees are Snatched away ..!! There are many Incidents of Demolition and Disfiguring of Temples and Hindu Civilization ..!!* 

*Incidences of Love Jihad and Rapes on Hindu Girls on Mass Levels, are seen in Kerala State, however, Govt. of Kerala, either Left or Congress, do not take any Cognisance, nor they Protect the Rights of Hindus ..!! Even in case of Education, it is FREE for Muslims and Hindus have to Pay Donetions to Educational Institutions, for Admission of their Children .. Legislative Assembly Constituencies in Kerala, are 140 ..!! Out of which, 50 MLAs are Muslims. In short, Kerala State is dominated by Muslims, in all respects ..!!* 

*It is the Humble Submission to the Hon. Prime Minister to bring a Bill in the Parliament, to Declare Kerala State as Union Territory so that, many Issues can be Resolved ..!! Of course, there will be lot of Opposition by Other Parties in the Country ..!!* 

*Thanking You;* 

*Yours Sincerely* 

*- All Indians ..*

1. You should NOT finish all housework in one day. Those who have done it are stressed and some are already buried.
2. Take time to rest, it's not a sin to sit, put your legs on the table and eat something you like.
3. SLEEP if necessary for headache to disappear. Those who refuse to take vacation leave, take time off or break time, if not, their families will miss them because they have prematurely gone on the journey without return.
4. STOP taking sedatives to sleep, you're destroying your brain and organs. Sometime you'll start forgetting things. Relax your brain, worry less, go for a walk, laugh, smile more, everything will happen eventually.
5. Meditate. Have a quiet time and relax. Breathe fresh air. Breathe out all negativities.
6. Stay in front of your mirror, smile for yourself. That turns on a positive aura around you, so you can shine with your own light.
7. GO buy you a snack or something to drink. Just do something for yourself, even if your partner doesn't do it for you... do it yourself, so you can download things in your head.
8. GET the appliances needed to ease your job and avoid stress as it is women's largest silent killer.
9. Ask help when you don't feel good, do something about it, go to health center, hospital or call some nearby doctor. Don't self medicate.
10. CONTROL YOUR PRESSURE AND SUGAR LEVEL OCCASIONALLY, whether you're sick or not. Doing this has saved a lot of women in the past. Trust this good advice I give you and give yourself the value you deserve, love and care, you are a great woman and don't forget you are Beautiful Instrument for Creation.
